Every day Agustin works on his plantation of manioc and sesame seeds. This is another way in which he can make addtitional earnings for his family. This pair of hardworking parents has sacrificed much to give their children the best quality of life they can. Today, Agustin is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise for his store, such as sugar, milk, rice, fruits, and juice, and seeds to plant.

loans.use: To increase stock for sale and seeds for farming

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma Ruth is 44 years old and has been selling food products for a long time. Her 5 children give her a great sense of joy and inspiration to move forward and fully throw herself into her work. This dedicated mother has worked hard to provide her family with the necessities to grow and develop, and with the objective of giving them a better quality of life, she wants to expand her business and eventually turn it into a mini market. Let's help this hard-working mother make her dreams a reality.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Irma Ruth de 44 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes desde hace mucho tiempo, es madre de 05 hijos los cuales diariamente le inyectan alegría para progresar y desarrollarse plenamente en su labor.Esta abnegada madre con mucho esfuerzo provee a su familia de sustento necesario para su normal desarrollo y con el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida desea implementar aún más su pequeño centro de ventas para acondicionar pronto en ese lugar un mini market.Posibilitemos su petición para que pronto esta trabajadora madre de familia convierta sus sueños en realidad.

loans.use: To implement and grow her business.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela has been selling ice cold drinks (beer and soda) for a long time. Her desire to continue forward is fuelled by her children who are studying and desire to have professional careers. She is 51 years old and wants to develop and establish her business. She also wants to make her business space larger so she can provide more comfort and a better service to her customers. She would like a loan to help her achieve her goals. She hopes for the help of a generous heart.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

Manuela se dedica a la venta de bebidas heladas (cervezas y gaseosas) desde hace tiempo, sus ganas de seguir adelante en este negocio, esta impulsada por sus hijos que estudian y poseen las ganas de desarrollarse procesionalmente en una carrera. Ella tiene 51 años de edad y muchas ganas de seguir creciendo con este su negocio de bebidas heladas ya que quiere implementarla y sobre todo ambientar su espacio de ventas para brindar una mejor atención y mayor comodidad a sus clientes, por esa razón requiere de un capital de inversión que le ayude a conseguir cada uno de sus propósitos.Ella espera la ayuda desinteresada de un bondadoso corazón.

loans.use: To establish her business.

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.en:
Dionisio R. is a 56-year-old married father of six children. His children are all grown and live and work on their own. In order to bring in sufficient income, he is the owner of two public buses that have routes throughout the surrounding cities. The company that he works for is Tapiracuay.

Dionisio has many dedicated clientele who use his buses. However Dionisio is still looking to expand his business and he hopes to have saved enough to soon buy another bus. The loan he is asking for will be used to fix the two buses he owns to give his clientele a more comfortable ride.

loans.use: To fix two buses

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Mrs. Miriam T., age 40, sells food from home. In the morning, she only offers chicken soup, while in the evening she sells different meals according to her customers’ requests. She is a mother of four, and this responsibility has taken her through various commercial paths, until finally settling on the activity about which she is so passionate: cooking. With the hopes of expanding her business, she is requesting a loan in order to construct a small, permanent stand out of which to sell local dishes to her faithful customers. With your help this beautiful mother will achieve her goal.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Miriam de 40 años de edad, vende comida en su domicilio, por las mañanas exclusivamente caldo de gallina y por las tardes diversos platos al gusto del cliente, es madre de 04 hijos y su responsabilidad la ha llevado por diversos senderos comerciales a fin de establecerse en la actividad que tanto le apasiona, la cocina.Con el deseo de acrecentar su negocio solicita un préstamo para construir un pequeño kiosco de venta permanente de platillos típicos a solicitud de sus asiduos clientes.Con tu ayuda esta bella madre logrará su propósito.

loans.use: Construction of a small stand

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Mrs. Karina T. has been selling petroleum for personal use for a short time. She is a 38-year-old mother of 4 daughters who adore her and tell her to achieve her dreams. The encouragement this mother receives from her daughters causes her to be a versatile woman in the job field, with the hopes that her daughters feel good and continue with their projects. Her goal of increasing the quality of her service drives her to ask for your support, so that she can obtain the loan that will facilitate the achievement of her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Karina se dedica a la venta particular de combustible (petróleo) desde hace poco tiempo. Tiene 38 años de edad es madre de 04 hijas que la adoran mucho y siempre le dicen que cumpla con sus sueños, el aliento que le dan sus hijas hacen que esta madre sea una mujer polifacética en el campo laboral, con el deseo de que sus hijas se sientan bien y continúen con sus proyectos.El firme propósito de incrementar la calidad de su servicio la conducen a solicitar vuestra ayuda para obtener el préstamo de dinero que facilitará el cumplimiento de su sueño.

loans.use: Improvement of her small business space

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
In the district of Cupi some 40 kilometers from the city of Ayaviri, we find Andrea’s restaurant, one of the most frequented dining establishments in this humble town. This restaurant has been in business for a year, and in that short time, it has managed to gain popularity thanks to the delicious stews that Andrea prepares in her wood-fired oven, which gives her dishes a special flavor. Andrea and her husband Eduardo, who works as an electrician, are trying to save enough money so that they can buy a small plot of land and construct their house. They plan to offer this dwelling to their children, and fill this sweet space with love and joy. In order to crystallize their wishes, she is requesting a loan that she plans to invest in the purchase of cooking utensils and in the expansion of her small restaurant. Your generous support will allow for the attainment of this charming couple’s dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

En el distrito de Cupi a 40 Km de la ciudad de Ayaviri encontramos el restaurante de doña Andrea, uno de los más concurridos establecimientos de comida que existe en este humilde pueblito, este restaurante ya tiene un año de funcionamiento y en este corto tiempo logró obtener gran popularidad gracias a los deliciosos potajes que prepara doña Andrea en su fogoncito de leña que le da un especial sabor a cada una de sus comidas.Andrea y su esposo Eduardo quien trabaja como electricista tratan de ahorrar los suficiente para comprar un terrenito y construir su casita, morada que desean ofrecer a los hijos que tienen planeado tener para llenar de amor y alegría su dulce espacio.Para cristalizar sus deseos hace la solicitud de un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de utensilios de cocina y para ampliar su pequeño restaurante.Vuestro generoso aporte permitirá cristalizar los deseos de esta encantadora pareja.

loans.use: Purchase of cooking utensils and expansion of restaurant

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Ever since Trinidad got married, she has always tried to excel in order to create a household in which love, unity, and family well-being prevail. Now, her small but well-stocked general store is giving her the opportunity to improve her living conditions. This hard-working mother starts tending her little shop at 5:30 in the morning and stays there until 9:00 at night, when her husband comes home from his strenuous job as a bricklayer. Trinidad and Valentín have two young children who are the motors that thrust the couple to move forward and work hard in their daily tasks. Thanks to their hard work, they have managed to build their own house, where they feel more at ease and safe. With this loan, she plans to increase her variety of products, thus continuing to boost customer satisfaction, and consequently, her family’s tranquility. For this reason, she seeks your help by requesting a loan. We can help make Trinidad’s plans concrete.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Desde que trinidad contrajo matrimonio trató siempre de sobresalir para formar un hogar en el que reine el amor, unión y bienestar familiar; ahora su pequeña pero surtida bodeguita de abarrotes y frutas le está dando la oportunidad de mejorar su situación de vida. Esta laboriosa madre empieza con la atención diaria de su surtida tiendita a partir de los 5.30 de la mañana y permanece en este lugar hasta las 9.00 de la noche, hora en que llega su esposo Valentín de su esforzado trabajo como albañil.Trinidad y Valentín, son padres de dos pequeños niños, quienes son el motor que los impulsa a seguir adelante y a esforzarse en sus actividades cotidianas, gracias a esto ambos lograron construir su propia casita, lugar donde se sienten más tranquilos y seguros.Ella al gozar de solicitudes y pedidos desea aumentar mucho más la variedad de sus productos, para así seguir incrementando la satisfacción de sus clientes y por ende la tranquilidad de su familia, por ese motivo recurre a vuestra ayuda y hace la petición de un préstamo.Nosotros podemos ayudar a concretar los proyectos de Trinidad.

loans.use: Purchase of greater quantity and better quality of products

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
At the age of 14, Eusebia decided to marry Simón, and from that young age on, she took on big responsibilities. One of those responsibilities is being a mother and looking after her family’s well-being. As more family members arrived, her house would fill with joy and love, but at the same time, the family expenses would increase. For this reason, Eusebia decided to buy and sell sheep for a living, and with diligence and perseverance she has been able to move this business forward. While this charming lady engages in her noble work, Simón works as a master bricklayer in his hometown of Cupi. Between the both of them, they try to offer financial stability and an education to their 5 children. Eusebia would like to take this opportunity to appeal to your generous heart by requesting a loan that she will invest in her business of buying and selling sheep. With the profits earned, her family will be able to enjoy peace and well-being.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

A los 14 años Eusebia decidió contraer matrimonio con Simón, desde entonces a su corta edad tomo responsabilidades muy grandes, una de ellas la de ser madre y velar por el bienestar de su familia, conforme llegaban más miembros a su hogar su morada se llenaba de alegría y amor, pero al mismo tiempo los gastos familiares se iban incrementando, razón por la cual Eusebia decidió dedicarse a la compra y venta de ganado (ovejas), negocio que con diligencia y constancia viene sacando adelante.Mientras ésta encantadora dama se dedica a esta noble labor, su esposo Simón trabaja como maestro albañil en su pueblo natal Cupi y entre los dos tratan de brindarles estabilidad económica y educación a sus cinco hijos.En esta oportunidad Eusebia recurre a tu generoso corazón y hace la solicitud de un préstamo que invertirá completamente en su negocio de compra y venta de animales, y con las ganancias que obtenga luego de su inversión su familia podrá gozar de tranquilidad y bienestar.

loans.use: Purchase of a greater quantity of sheep

loans.name: Melchora

texts.es:
Melchora is a native of the Cupi zone. From a young age, she has been in continuous contact with the noble job of cattle raising. She learned and inherited this trade from her parents, who dedicated most of their lives to this job. This generous mother, along with her husband Carlos and their five dependent children, raise young calves and sheep for a living. Thanks to the diligence that they employ day to day when looking after and feeding their cattle, they are quickly managing to multiply their cattle. This hardworking mother’s wish is to buy another calf so that she can take care of her and provide her with food. In the future, she would like to get milk, which she will give to her young children, from this cow. With this goal in mind, she appeals to your good heart in search of your help.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

loans.use: Purchase of a calf

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Juliana is a woman who loves working with nature. Despite her age, she still possesses strength, optimism, and the will to keep moving forward in order to provide her children with a good education and quality of life. She is a hardworking mother who knows neither fatigue nor illness. Ever since her husband passed away, she has wholeheartedly dedicated herself to her 8 children and to her noble work in the fields. Thanks to her efforts, her four eldest children are now independent and professionals. This exemplary mother’s wish is to give her offspring an education, and with that aim, she tirelessly devotes herself to her work. She believes that boosting her production will increase her earnings. For this purpose, she turns to your gentle heart.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Juliana, es una mujer que ama la naturaleza y el trabajo en ella, pese a su avanzada edad aún conserva la fuerza, optimismo, y voluntad de seguir adelante y ofrecerles una buena educación y calidad de vida a sus hijos.Ella es una madre muy luchadora y trabajadora, que no conoce de cansancio ni enfermedad, desde que su esposo falleció se dedicó íntegramente a sus ocho hijos y a su noble trabajo en el campo, gracias a este esfuerzo actualmente sus cuatro hijos mayores son independientes y profesionales.El deseo que tiene esta ejemplar madre es brindarles a cada uno de sus retoños educación, con ese fin sigue desenvolviéndose incansablemente en su trabajo; ella considera que aumentando la cantidad de su producción mejorarán sus ingresos económicos, con ese propósito recurre a tu gentil corazón.

loans.use: Increase capital to raise production

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
This is Mariano, a hard-working and enterprising father. His efforts, dedication, and broad knowledge of agriculture and cattle raising are leading him through the road of progress. Thanks to his work, he and his family have been able to overcome many difficult situations. Mariano and his wife, Silveria, have three children. The entire family cultivates their land. Thanks to the love and dedication with which they work the gifts that Mother Nature bestows upon them, they have yielded a large amount of fruits. With the sale of these fruits, Mariano can provide his children with health and an education. This responsible and diligent father is planning to increase the productivity of his fields because he believes that investing in his business will further increase his earnings and, consequently, his family’s quality of life. We can help this industrious family to keep blossoming.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Él es Mariano, padre muy laborioso y emprendedor, su empeño, dedicación y amplio conocimiento de agricultura y ganadería le están llevando por el camino del progreso con estas actividades, gracias a estas labores pudo sobrellevar muchas circunstancias difíciles por las que atravesó su familia.Mariano y su esposa Silveria son padres de tres hijos, todos juntos se dedican a labrar sus tierras, gracias al cariño y dedicación con el que trabajan las bondades que les otorga la madre naturaleza obtienen una amplia producción de frutos y con la venta brinda bienestar y educación a sus hijos.Este responsable y trabajador padre tiene pensado aumentar la productividad de sus tierras, considera que invirtiendo en sus productos mejorarán aún más sus ingresos económicos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su amada familia.Vosotros podemos apoyar a que esta laboriosa familia siga floreciendo

loans.use: Increase capital to raise production

loans.name: Erasmo

texts.es:
The district of Cupi is located some 4,200 meters above sea level. Very industrious residents who work in agriculture and cattle raising inhabit this town. Mr. Erasmo M. is a loving and attentive father who also works in this domain. This charming father has been raising and selling cattle from a young age. He learned this discipline from his parents, who actively dedicated themselves to this noble trade. With this same will and dedication, Erasmo tries to take the best advantage of this industry in order to support his family. He buys his calves in his hometown of Cupi, and after providing them with care and nourishment, he proceeds to sell them when they are the adequate size. While he works in this noble trade, his wife, Paola, sells snacks in the Armas plaza of the aforesaid town. They both try to offer their 6 loving children comfort and well-being. Erasmo would like to take this opportunity to appeal to your good heart. He is requesting this loan because he plans on investing the money in the purchase of two young calves, thus increasing his earnings.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

A unos 4200 msnm está ubicado el Distrito de Cupi, este pueblito en su interior alberga a pobladores muy laboriosos y dedicados a las labores agrícolas y ganadas, Don Erasmo padre muy amoroso y atento no es ajeno a estas labores.Este encantador padre desde muy pequeño siempre se dedicó a la producción y comercialización de ganado, esta actividad la aprendió y heredó de sus padres, quienes muy activamente desempeñaban este noble oficio y con el mismo empeño y voluntad Erasmo trata de sacar el mejor provecho y beneficio para el sustento de su familia.Él compra sus terneritas en su pueblo natal Cupi, luego de brindarles un adecuado cuidado y alimentación procede a venderlas cuando estas toman un tamaño apropiado, mientras él se dedica a este noble oficio su esposa Paola vende golosinas en la plaza de Armas de dicho pueblito, y juntos tratan de brindarles comodidad y bienestar a sus 6 amorosos hijos.En esta oportunidad Erasmo recurre a tu buen corazón y hace la solicitud de un préstamo ya que tiene proyectado invertir este dinero en la compra de dos terneritas y con eso aumentar la cantidad de su ganado.

loans.use: Purchase of two young calves

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
The district of Cupi is located 40 kilometers away from the Melgar province. This town is a predominantly cattle raising and agricultural zone, and Mrs. Avelina C.’s family is no stranger to this noble traD.. She, along with her husband and two young daughters, actively works in agriculture and raising alpacas. Avelina and her husband, Miguel, work arduously and try to take the most advantage of the small plot of land that they inherited from their parents, meticulously cultivating barley, quinoa, potatoes, and other tubers, while concurrently raising their livestock. With these jobs, they are trying to augment the family’s income and keep their beloved children from want. She wishes to boost her capital in order to increase her number of alpacas and crops.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

A unos 40 kilómetros D. la provincia D. Melgar está ubicado el distrito D. Cupi. Este pueblito es una zona eminentemente ganadera y agrícola, la familia D. la señora Avelina no es ajena a esta noble labor, ella junto a su esposo y a sus pequeñas niñas se dedica activamente a la agricultura y al cuidado D. sus alpaquitas.Avelina y su esposo, Miguel, trabajan arduamente y tratan D. sacarle el mayor provecho y beneficio posible al terrenito que por herencia le dejaron sus padres, cultivando empeñosamente cebada, quinua, papa y demás tubérculos, al mismo tiempo se dedica a la crianza D. sus animalitos, con estas labores tratan D. mejorar los ingresos económicos D. su familia y a mantener sin privaciones a sus amados hijos.Desea incrementar su capital D. inversión para acrecentar el número D. sus animalitos y los productos D. sus tierras.

loans.use: Purchase of a larger number of alpacas and seeds to increase crops

loans.name: Lucrecia Nury

texts.es:
Mrs. Lucrecia is a single mother and lives with her 2 children in Villa Reconcilliacion. She has more than 25 years of experience in the sale of clothing, shoes, and small appliances and also has the ability to sew clothing. Before starting her business she used to sew for a living and her customers convinced her to start selling general merchandise. This activity enabled her to increase her income and thus feed her two children since she is the head of the household and her sewing did not sufficiently cover the expenses of her home.

She started her sales business with financing. She sells the small appliances on order and does not have any inventory of them. In the future she plans to improve her living conditions and count with a better infrastructure, her house is in need of improvements. For these improvements she is requesting the loan, funds to start building the front part of her house.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

Doña Lucrecia es madre soltera, vive con sus 2 hijos en Villa Reconciliación, posee mas lleva 25 años de experiencia en ventas de ropa, zapatos, electrodoméstico, además posee otras habilidades como coser ropa, antes de emprender su negocio se dedicaba a elaborar prendas de vestir y fueron sus clientas la que la impulsaron a que vendieran mercadería en general, ya que con esa actividad le generaría mayores ingresos con los cuales pudiese alimentar a sus 2 hijos, siendo ella el pilar de su casa debía de mantener todos los gastos y la costura no le era suficientes.

Es con un financiamiento que empieza a vender los productos que hoy en día comercializa. En existencia no cuenta con electrodomésticos ya que solo los vende por encargo. En un futuro la señora desea mejorar su nivel de vida y tener una vivienda con una mejor infraestructura, ya que la vivienda requiere de una mejora, por lo cual solicita un préstamo para iniciar a construir el frente de su casa.

loans.use: Purchase metal, cement, cinder blocks for the improvement of her house.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es:
Amalia is a mother who is dedicated to looking after her children. She is capable of sacrificing many things for them, and it is for this reason that she dedicates most of her time taking care of them. The best way that she found to do so was raising sheep and pigs in her own home. The place where they live has a peculiarity since both the rural and urban landscapes live together harmoniously. She has a humble home, but the harmony of a united family prevails there. Her husband is a deliveryman who provides services to a local market using an urban delivery tricycle. Many times, however, his earnings are not sufficient to cover the household expenses, which is why Amalia works so hard raising her livestock and selling them at an affordable price at the local cattle market. She and her husband are convinced that only a good education will bring personal development, since many times not having any skills renders getting a job more difficult. With this purpose in mind, she is requesting a loan in order to increase her livestock by purchasing hens because she has seen a demand for them in the area. With your help, this humble family will soon be able to improve its quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Amalia, es una madre de familia muy dedicada a cuidar a sus hijos, ella es capaz de sacrificar muchas cosas por ellos y ésta es la razón por la que se dedica casi todo el tiempo a cuidarlos y vio la mejor manera de hacerlo criando carneros y cerdos en su propia casa. El lugar que habitan tiene una particularidad pues cohabitan armoniosamente el paisaje rural con el urbano, su morada es humilde pero reina la armonía de una familia unida en la que su esposo es un humilde triciclero que ofrece servicios de carga en el mercado; muchas veces los ingresos diarios no satisfacen las necesidades es por ese motivo que Amalia se esfuerza con la crianza de sus animales para que los pueda vender a buen precio en la feria ganadera de su zona. Así mismo ella y su esposo están convencidos de que sólo una buena educación será la que compense un buen desarrollo individual ya que muchas veces el no tener un oficio dificulta obtener un trabajo. Con ese propósito en mente solicita un préstamo para incrementar el número de sus animalitos comprando gallinas ya que ha observado la demanda local de esta ave.Con vuestra ayuda esta humilde familia pronto podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.

loans.use: Purchase of hens

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
Mrs. S. is an enterprising woman who is always searching for a way to offer her family well-being. She is a humble farmer who has been working in this domain since childhood. Her enterprising spirit has motivated her to keep working hard. She has established a cattle complex in her hometown of Huancavelica, where she periodically travels to in order to monitor the progress of her livestock. Since she currently lives in the city of Huancayo, she always brings cows and/or bulls on each trip to sell them to her buyers at the cattle market. Because she would like to increase her amount of cattle, she is requesting a loan that she plans on investing in the purchase of young livestock, thus increasing her variety.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Luisa, es una mujer muy emprendedora que siempre ve la mejor manera de otorgarles bienestar a los miembros de su familia, ella es una humilde agricultora y se dedica a estas actividades desde su niñez, su espíritu emprendedor la ha motivado a seguir esforzándose.En su pueblo natal de Huancavelica ha establecido un complejo ganadero y periódicamente viaja a esta ciudad para observar el progreso de sus animalitos, debido a que radica actualmente en la ciudad de Huancayo, a este lugar en cada viaje de retorno trae vacas y/o toros a solicitud de sus compradores para ofertarlos en la feria ganadera.El deseo de incrementar la cantidad de sus animalitos la conducen a solicitar un préstamo ya que tiene planeado invertir esta cantidad en la compra de pequeños animalitos para incrementarla variedad de los mismos.

loans.use: Purchase of young cattle

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mrs. Elizabeth is a small business owner with more than 13 years of experience in serving her customers. She started her business by selling home made food out of her home, and captured a large number of customers this way, customers who enjoyed the tasty dishes that she prepared herself. This is the reason for her decision to open a restaurant which has evolved into a very attractive business. She offers excellent service to her customers, is located in an area with good traffic and security, the place is attractively decorated with a straw roof. The inside of the restaurant is well air conditioned and large, and the menu consists of local and foreign dishes. She plans to open another branch of her business in the future. She is currently requesting a loan to be able to remodel the front of her restaurant making it more attractive for her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Elizabeth es una microempresaria de más de 13 años de experiencia en atención a clientes, los comienzos de su negocio surge con la venta de comida casera en su casa de habitación, con esta actividad capturó un buen número de clientes que degustaban de los ricos platillos que ella misma preparaba, razón por la cual decide montar un restaurante, el cual se ha convertido en un negocio atractivo, ofrece un excelente servicio personalizado a los clientes, se encuentra en una zona transitada, segura, presenta una decoración atractiva con techo de paja, en el interior cuenta con áreas bien climatizadas, es amplio, cuenta con un menú de platillos y bebidas nacionales y extranjeros. La idea de la señora a futuro es la de expandirse y abrir otra sucursal en estos momentos requiere de un préstamo, ya que desea remodelar la parte del frente del local, haciéndolo más atractivopara los clientes.

loans.use: Purchase of studs, zinc, cement and metal for the remodel of the premises.

loans.name: Alida

texts.es:
Alida is a young, optimistic, hard-working young lady. She has not let life difficulties get in the way of her dreams. Her parents got separated and slowly began losing their support. It was through an invitation of one of her friends that she began selling make-up to people in her neighborhood and friends. Thanks to this business, she's been able to improve her financial life and continues to work on her goal of becoming a secretary. With her two younger sibling's support and advice she receives from her mother, she's decided to increase her capital. This way she will get more money to support her college goals. Your help is very important in helping her wishes come true.

Translated from Spanish by Maria Peterson, Kiva Volunteer.

Alida, es una joven muy optimista y trabajadora, ella no se deja abatir por las dificultades que le han tocado vivir tras la separación de sus padres y el poco apoyo que recibió de ellos.Fue así que por medio de la invitación de una de sus amigas observó lo provechoso de la comercialización de cosméticos a personas de su barrio y a sus amistades, gracias a este negocio ha podido mejorar su situación económica y a renovado sus deseos de convertirse en una excelente secretaria. La ayuda de sus dos hermanos menores y la compañía y consejos de su querida madre la alientan día a día por esa razón ha decidido incrementar su capital de inversión a fin de obtener mayores ganancias para pronto incorporarse a los estudios de la carrera que tanto le apasiona.Vuestra ayuda es muy importante para la cristalización de los deseos de esta bella joven.

loans.use: Increase her capital in order to purchase more products

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
Betty is a very hard working girl, always alert to her family needs. It was for this reason that she decided to open a store which offers phone services to neighbors who don't own a phone. This business has helped a bit in improving their lifestyle. However, her children continue to grow and their demands have increased as well. With the desire of improving her business, she's decided to purchase a xerox machine in order to offer additional services. Your help is very important to this hard-working mother.

Translated from Spanish by Maria Peterson, Kiva Volunteer.

Betty, es una persona muy trabajadora, siempre esta pendiente de cada una de las necesidades de su familia con el fin de responder satisfactoriamente a cada una de ellas. Fue por esta razón que decidió abrir un locutorio en el que también ofrece servicios de recepción de llamadas de cada uno de sus vecinos que no cuentan con una línea telefónica en casa.El empleo esporádico de su esposo no ha contribuido desde hace muchos años a elevar su calidad de vida, ahora con los nuevos beneficios que obtienen a través de su dedicación a esta labor ha podido concretar este hecho, sin embargo susu hijos han ido creciendo durante todo este tiempo y las demandas de cada uno de ellos han variado y se han ido incrementando. Con el propósito de satisfacerlas ha decidido incorporar en su pequeño espacio un bazar y una máquina fotocopiadota para brindar sus servicios de manera adicional y frecuente.Tu ayuda es muy importante para esta trabajadora madre.

loans.use: Purchase a phone booth and xerox machine

loans.name: Luis Guillermo

texts.es:
Luis Alberto is 40 years old, lives in the Memorial Sandino area with his family and works for the Coca Cola company from Nicaragua en the production department. He has 18 years of experience in this area. From this job he has been able to raise a small dwelling which to this day, does not have good conditions because he has other expenses that he has prioritized above his home. He does not have sufficient income to complete the construction to his house. The necessities to the house are that the the man that lives in back of the dwelling actually lives with him in his room and that the room is laminated with zinc and concret. The situation is urgent and makes him want to improve his situation by also constructing a drain where the water from the street will not go into his house, since the majority of inhabitants of the area do not count on plumbing to avoid this problem.

This story was translated from Spanish to English by Nikita Ramchandani, KIVA Volunteer.

Luis Alberto tiene 40 años de edad, habita en el asentamiento Memorial Sandino con su familia, trabaja en la compañía Coca Cola de Nicaragua en el área de producción, cuenta con 18 años de experiencia en esa área. Es con este trabajo como él ha podido levantar su pequeña vivienda, la cual todavía no presenta buenas condiciones, ya que ha priorizado otros gastos y no ha tenido los suficientes recursos económicos para completar la construcción de toda la vivienda, la necesidad con la que cuenta este señor es la parte de atrás de la vivienda que queda junto a su cuarto, el cual es mitad laminas de zinc y mitad concreto, situación que le urge mejorar, así como también construir un sumidero en donde el agua de la calle pueda correr sin metérsele en su vivienda, ya que en la zona donde habita la mayoría de los pobladores no cuenta con tuberías que le permitan expulsar el desagüe de las casas.

loans.use: To buy Iron, cement, sand, blocks, stone quarry and Pipe PVC

loans.name: Roberto José

texts.es:
Don Roberto is married, is 35 years old and has three minor age children. He works as a mechanic in an auto repair shop. His work has allowed him to move his family ahead. His wife works as an operator in a tax-free zone. Both parents work all day. The salaries that they receive are small and sometimes do not cover the expenses of the home.

With much difficulty they have been building their house. They have not yet been able to finish it due to lack of funds. Currently the back wall is the priority because it is in bad shape and they fear that their home is not structurally sound. Their wishes are for better living conditions for their children.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

Don Roberto es casado, tiene 35 años de edad, con tres hijos, todos menores de edad, se desempaña como mecánico en un taller automotriz, su trabajo le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia, su esposa trabaja de operaria en una zona franca, ambos padres trabajan todo el día, los sueldos que perciben esta familia son pocos y en ocasiones no alcanzan a cubrir los gastos de su hogar.

Con mucha dificultad han ido levantando su humilde vivienda, todavía no han logrado terminarla debido a la falta de recursos monetarios, en estos momentos necesitan priorizar la pared de la parte de atrás de la vivienda la cual se encuentra en mal estado y temen por la seguridad habitacional en la que se encuentra su casa, ya que desean que sus hijos se encuentren en mejores condiciones de vida.

loans.use: Purchase cement blocks, iron, sand and rock

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Doña Dolores is a widow with four children who are dependent on her. She has a refreshment stand and an ice cream parlor where she works every day and on the weekends and she also sells a beef dish. Through these activities she maintains her house and her kids. Every morning, she starts to prepare her refreshments and icre creams that are of high demand by her clients . In the middle of the week, she begins to prepare to sell her beef dish, which take 2 days to prepare.

All of her children support her business, since with her advancing her age, she needs the help. She administers and attends her business. She needs to buy supplies to prepare her refreshments and prepare her beef dish. Every week she buys materials for the dish, whose prices may rise and that will affect her ability to buy them. Many times the prices for the same amount of materials vary.

This story has been translated from Spanish to English by Nikita Ramchandani, KiVA Volunteer.

Doña Dolores es viuda, tiene 4 hijos quienes dependen de ella, tiene una refresquería y heladería la cual atiende todos los días y los fines de semana, también vende nacatamales, con esta actividad esta madre mantiene su casa y a sus hijos. Cada mañana empieza a elaborar sus refrescos y helados, los cuales tiene una buena aceptación y demanda por sus clientes, a mediados de la semana empieza a preparar los nacatamales lo cual le llevan 2 días para hacerlos. Todos sus hijos la apoyan en el negocio, ya que por su avanzada edad necesita de ayuda, ella administra y atiende su negocio. La señora necesita comprar insumos para elaborar sus refrescos y preparar sus nacatamales, ya que cada semana compra la materia prima que requiere en cada producto que elabora y las alzas en los precios de los productos le están afectando a la hora de adquirir sus insumos, ya que muchas veces no ajusta para comprar las mismas cantidades con las que siempre trabaja.

loans.use: To buy fruit, vegetables, pork and a sack of sugar.

loans.name: Mario Francisco

texts.es:
Mario lives a rural community of Ticuantepe; he is married and has 2 minor age children. Eight years ago he started a small business in his humble home because he was unemployed at the time and the head of the household. Together with his wife, he decided to open a grocery store which would offer food products for his neighbors. His goal was to offer a variety of products that were affordable and easily accessible since they live in a very mountainous area far away from town, several kilometers away from the central market of the municipality.

Currently the grocery store is in need of a major investment. The area is growing and his customers are requesting more products. He wants to diversify his supply of red and white meat. His customers buy daily what they consume and he would like to guarantee the availability of all the products that they need to prepare their meals and feed their families.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

Mario habita en una comunidad rural de Ticuantepe, esta casado y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, hace 8 años en su humilde vivienda creó su pequeño negocio, ya que se encontraba sin empleo en ese momento y era él la cabeza de su hogar, al verse en esa situación decidió junto a su esposa montar una pulpería en la que ofrecerían productos alimenticios de consumo masivo a sus vecinos, con el objetivo de ofrecerles una variedad de productos que estuviesen al alcance del bolsillo y que lo encontraran muy cerca de sus viviendas, ya que habitan en una zona muy montañosa, alejada del pueblo y en la cual recorren varios kilómetros para transitar y llegar al mercado central de ese municipio.

Actualmente, la pulpería requiere de mayor inversión, ya que la zona donde habita esta creciendo y sus clientes están demandando mayormente los productos, además de diversificar la oferta de carne roja y blanca, ya que sus clientes compran día a día lo que consumen y por lo mismo desean garantizarles todos los productos que necesitan para elaborar sus comidas y alimentar a sus familias.

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, beans, oil, milk, juices, bread, chicken, meat, eggs, cheese, vegetables.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
Mrs. Tomasa is 57 years old, she lives in apartment 3-80 of a very poor neighborhood. Streets are not paved, there is not enough water, not many cars are seen due to the lack of paved roads. This lady's house is very humble, she lives alone, she works for a local company, and the salary she earns has been established by the local government. At this time, her house is in very bad physical conditions.

Her big dream at this time is to build a wall which will give her the support , security and stability needed. She wishes to begin construction of one of these walls until she's ready to complete it, then be able to enjoy it as she ages in time.

Translated from Spanish by Maria Peterson, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Tomasa tiene 57 años de edad, habita en el asentamiento 3-80, un barrio pobre, con calles sin pavimentar, escasez de agua, vía poco transitadas por vehículos debido al mal estado de las calles. La vivienda de la señora es muy humilde, vive sola, trabaja como conserje en una empresa, el salario que devenga es el salario mínimo establecido por el gobierno, su casa se encuentra en malas condiciones físicas. El mayor sueño de la señora es la de construir un muro que abarque toda la vivienda para que le de soporte, seguridad y estabilidad. La señora desea iniciar a construir una a una las paredes del muro de su casa, hasta lograr terminarlo y en un fututo pueda gozar de una vejez tranquila y con mejores condiciones habitacionales.

loans.use: Purchase of materials in order to build a wall in her house

loans.name: I Nyoman Landra

texts.id:
Living in a village called Nusasari, high up on a plateau, I Nyoman Ladra has converted 50 acres of land that he owns into a plantation. On this farm this father of two began planting vanilla next to his other crops. Vanila is a plant that yields a spice that can be developed into a flavor because of its pleasing aroma. Typically it is put into cakes and other foods. Vanila is a highly valued domestic and export commodity.

I Nyoman Ladra is very enthusiastic about planting and growing vanilla at the back portion of his land. His wife Ni Made Kasih assists him with the process of readying the land, planting and fertilizing. I Nyoman Ladra bought seeds at a unit price of Rp.3,000 (USD equivalent $0.30) from other farmers. He now owns about five hundred vanilla trees that at this time have begun bearing fruit. Based on an estimated yield of up to 150 kilograms and the price per kilo at this time of Rp. 35,000 (USD equivalent of $3.80), within one planting season -- that is one year -- his sales can be Rp. 5,250,000 (USD equivalent of $574), not including profits from the sale of seeds. At this time he needs funds to pay for care, fertilizer and treatment against fungus so that his vanilla plants can produce at maximum capacity.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Aarati, Kiva volunteer.

Tinggal disebuah desa yang berada di daerah dataran agak tinggi yaitu desa Nusasari, membuat I Nyoman Ladra mengolah 50 are tanah miliknya untuk menjadi area perkebunan. Di lahan inilah Bapak dua orang anak ini sejak dua tahun yang lalu memulai menanam vanili , di samping tanaman kebun lainnya . Vanili adalah tanaman kebun yang di ambil buahnya untuk di jadikan penyedap rasa karena aromanya yang harum. Biasanya dicampurkan dalam bahan membuat kue dan makanan lainnya . Vanili memiliki nilai ekonomis yang sangat tinggi baik dalam pasar dalam negeri maupun untuk di ekspor. Dengan latar belakang inilah I Nyoman Ladra sangat antusias untuk menanam dan memelihara Vanili . Proses penyiapan lahan , penanaman dan pemupukan dilakukan I Nyoman Ladra yang di bantu oleh Ni Made Kasih, istrinya .Sedangkan untuk bibit dia peroleh dari membeli pada petani lain dengan harga Rp..3.000.-/m . I Nyoman Ladra memiliki sekitar 500 pohon Vanili yang pada saat ini sudah mulai menghasilkan buah, dan berdasarkan perkiraan hasil panennya mencapai 150 Kg dan harga per kilogram saat ini Rp. 35.000.- Jadi dalam sekali panen, yaitu 1 tahun, I Nyoman Ladra mendapat hasil penjualan Rp 5.250.000,- belum termasuk dari hasil penjualan bibit . Saat ini ia membutuhkan dana untuk biaya perawatan, pupuk dan obat anti hama sehingga kebun Vanilinya bisa berproduksi dengan maksimal.

loans.use: To pay for the cost of care, insecticide and disease prevention for his vanilla crops

loans.name: I Komang Wistra

texts.id:
Thirty-eight year old I Komang Wistra lives in a rural village called Anyarsari Desa Nusasari, a village in the district of Melaya in western Bali. The residents of this area typically work as farmers. Particularly in the area where I Komang Wistra lives, the majority of the farming is related to cocoa and vanilla plantations. The reason for this is because the irrigation required for these crops is only rain water.

I Komang Wistra farms vanilla on a portion of a 50 acre farm that he owns. This is a long-term farming efffort, because vanilla only yields after having been planted for two years or so, and that too it has to go through several processes such as soil tilling, fertilizing and pollination. A quality yield requires adequate fertilizer and also insecticide and fungus prevention to ward off insects and disease that can plague vanilla stems. In addition, the flowers that become the harvested spice also have to be arranged such that there are a manageable amount of seeds per stem (more or less 10-15 seeds) so that each stem can grow large and long.

With a loan from Dinari, I Komang Wistra can buy fertilizer and can give his plants the required anti-fungus treatment and other care. The plantings will thrive and then the only thing that will be left to do is to wait to harvest them. As such, he will feel extremely supported financially. He is very thankful for the funds that he can borrow.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Aarati, Kiva volunteer.

I Komang Wistra, 38 tahun, tinggal di dusun Anyarsari Desa Nusasari, sebuah desa di kecamatan Melaya daerah Bali bagian barat . Yang mana penduduk di tempat ini rata rata bermata pencaharian sebagai petani. Khususnya di lingkungan tempat tinggal I komang Wistra, sebagian besar petani disini adalah Petani perkebunan seperti : Kakau dan Vanili .Hal ini disebabkan karena pengairan diwilayah tersebut hanya mengandalkan air hujan saja . I Komang Wistra sendiri mengisi sebagian dari 50 are lahan miliknya dengan menanam Vanili sebagai tanaman jangka panjang , Karena tanaman Vanili baru bisa berproduksi kurang lebih setelah tanaman berumur 2 tahun. Dan itupun harus melalui beberapa proses seperti penggemburan tanah, pemupukan dan setelah berbunga juga harus dikawinkan . Untuk mendapatkan buah dengan kwalitas yang baik diperlukan pemupukan yang tepat dan juga penyemprotan hama / jamur yang biasanya menyerang batang Vanili. Begitu juga bunga yang akan dijadikan buah haruslah diatur agar tidak terlalu banyak Kurang lebih 10 -15 biji per tangkai sehingga buah yang di hasilkan besar dan panjang .Dengan pinjaman dari Dinari, I Komang Wistra membeli pupuk dan melakukan penyemprotan sesuai dengan kebutuhan . Tanaman Vanili I Wayan Wistra tumbuh dengan subur dan kini tinggal menunggu panen untuk I Wayan Wistra merasa sangat terbantu dari segi perekonomiannya dan ia sangat berterima kasih atas pinjaman yang didapatnya.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and anti-fungus treatment

loans.name: Ni Ketut Suci

texts.id:
In the beginning Ni Ketut Suci opened her goods stall on a small scale because she had limited means, but over time this business has expanded to its current state. The items sold include daily necessities as well as a variety of food and light refreshments and drinks that are sought after by kids. Her primary customers are residents of the surrounding area and schoolchildren.

Ni Ketut Suci has two children who are at this time in junior high. Because of them, Ni Ketut Suci is motivated to be even more enterprising in her business because she wishes for her two children can get educated to the highest level and then change the family fortune. In a day’s work at her stall Ni Ketut Suci earns as much as Rp. 50,000 up to Rp. 80,000 (USD equivalent $5 = $8) which she later uses for daily living expenses and, if there is any remainder, it gets saved up for future school fees. At this time she really needs additional funds because she wants to expand her business and improve and repair the condition of her stall so it is bigger, tidier and cleaner. With these changes Ni Ketut Suci hopes that her customers will feel more comfortable and her earnings will increase substantially.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Aarati, Kiva volunteer.

Awalnya Ni Ketut Suci membuka usaha warung ini hanya kecil-kecilan karena tidak memiliki modal yang banyak, tetapi lama-lama usaha ini berkembang menjadi lebih besar lagi hinga menjadi seperti sekarang ini. Barang –barang yang dijualnya meliputi kebutuhan pokok setiap hari dan juga berbagai macam makanan dan juga minuman ringan yang sangat digemari oleh anak –anak.Yang menjadi pelanggan utamanya adalah warga yang ada disekitar tempat tinggalnya dan juga anak-anak sekolah. Ni Ketut Suci memiliki dua orang anak yang sat ini sedang duduk dibangku SMP. Tentu hal inilah yang memotivasi Ni Ketut Suci untuk lebih giat lagi dalam menjalankan usaha ini karena Ni Ketut Suci berharap nantinya kedua anaknya ini bisa sekolah sampai tingkat tinggi dan bisa mengubah ekonomi keluarga. Dalam sehari usaha warung ini Suci bisa mendapatkan keuntungan sebesar Rp. 50.000.- sampai Rp. 80.000.- setiap hari dan dari keuntungan inilah nantinya di pakai oleh Ni Ketut Suci untuk memenuhi biaya hidupnya setiap hari dan jika ada sisanya akan ditabung untuk biaya sekolah anaknya kelak. Saat ini Ni Ketut Suci sangat membutuhkan tambahan modal karena Ni Ketut Suci ingin memperbesar usahanya dengan memperbaiki kondisi warungnya agar lebih besar, rapi dan bersih. Dengan perubahan itu Ni Ketut Suci berharap agar pelanggannya akan merasa nyaman dan keuntungan yang didapat pun bertambah banyak.

loans.use: Improvements to the store so it will be bigger, tidier and cleaner

loans.name: Mavdjuda

texts.ru:
Mavdjuda Kalandarovna N. lives in the region of Shahrinau. She is married and has 5 children. She is 38 years old and has secondary education. She does not work, but keeps her business by feeding, growing and then selling calves. She plans to get a loan so that she can buy more calves at lower price as the prices go down in February and March because of the lack of fodder. Summertime is the season to sell for a more profitable price. This business helps in the development of animal husbandry and stabilize the prices for meat and livestock as well as help her family improve their financial situation. Mavdjuda has 10 years of experience in this field. She plans to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Ниезова Мавджуда Каландаровна проживает в районе Шахринау. Замужем, имеет 5 детей. Возраст 38 лет..Образование среднее.Не работает .Но занимается откормкой бычков с последующей продажей.Планирует получить кредит для того ,чтобы купить бычков по более низкой цене, т.к в феврале и в марте цены на скот падают из-за нехватки корма.А летом в сезон продать по более выгодной цене. Это бизнес позволяет развивать данный сектор . при котором стабилизируются цены на мясо и скот, а так же помочь своей семье улучшить финансовое положение.Опыт в этой свере клиентка имеет уже 10 лет.Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Burhon

texts.ru:
Burhon Huseynovich S. lives in the region of Shahrinau. He is married and has five children. He is 54 years old and has secondary education. He is an entrepreneur and makes his living by buying and selling livestock. He has a 25-year experience in this field. He plans to use the loan to buy sheep and goat for their feeding and resale. This business helps the development of animal husbandry in this region besides that it provides the residents with fresh meat and meat products. Buhron plans to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Садиков Бурхон Хусейнович проживает в районе Шахринау. Женат имеет 5 детей. Возраст 54 года..Образование среднее.Работает предпринимателем по купле-продаже мелко-рогатого скота. Опыт в данном бизнесе 25 лет. Кредит планирует использовать на покупку овец и коз , для откормки и последующей перепродажи.Этот вид деятельности позволяет способствовать развитию животноводства в данной местности, что кроме того позволяет обеспечит население мясом и мясными продуктами.Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Igamerov

texts.ru:
I. Igamerov is 25 years old, married but has no children yet. He works at the automotive shop as a master car repairman. On weekends he buys and sells cattle. Currently he has two cows and 5 rams. Together with his wife he fattens the cattle and sells the animals at the Chairuch market. I. is applying for a loan to purchase two additional cows for fattening.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Эгамеров Ислом ,возрост 25 лет женат пока детей не имеет.Сам работает в техстанции мастером по ремонту автомашин.В выходные дни занимается куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота.Сейчас имеет 2 коровы и 5 баранов.Они вместе с женой откармливают скот и продают на Чайрухском базаре. Сейчас хочет взяв займ купить еще пару коровы для откорма.

loans.use: Fattening and sale of cattle

loans.name: Gulomaly

texts.ru:
Gulomaly G. lives in the city of Fayzabad. He is 55 years old, married and has three children. He has a college education and is a dentist by profession. He works as a dentist in Fayzabad, but besides his work he also does animal husbandry. His experience in this field is five years. He plans to use the loan to buy a calve and after feeding it for about 40 days he will sell it on the market. Gulomaly's business allows to improve the financial situation of his family and also facilitates the development of farming in this region. He plans to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Гаффоров Гуломали житель города Файзобод. Возраст 55 лет , женат имеет 3 детей.Образование высшее. По специальности Стамотолог . Работает стоматологом в районе Файзабад.Кроме того он занимается животноводством. Опыт в бизнесе 5 лет.Кредит планирует использовать на покупку бычка, а затем после откормки ,которая продолжается около 40 дней, перепродать на рынке. Его бизес позволяет улучшить финансовое положение в семье , а так же способствовать развитию фермерской деятельности в районе. Погасить кредит планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy a calve

loans.name: Teth

texts.en: Mrs. Teth C., 53, has 8 children  and grows resin plants to sell. She earns about $5 a day. Her husband Mr. Plot Han, 59, works as a farmer and typically earns just a $1 a day of profit. This couple hopes to use their loan to purchase a motor-bike for their daily commute.

loans.use: This couple hopes to use this loan to purchase a motor-bike for their daily commute.

loans.name: Eshonkulov

texts.ru:
A. Eshonkulov was born in 1967 and is the father of two children. He works as a bus driver. A. has a lot of experience in raising livestock. Currently he has two beef cows and 20 rams in his barn. His wife is very skilled at milking cows, and that is why A. is planning to buy two milk cows to have his own source of milk. In the past he had cows for dairy but sold them to buy sheep.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Эшонкулов Абдукарим,1967 года рождения отец двух детей .Работает водителем на АПТ-33 автобуса.Абдукарим хорошо разбирается в крупнорогатом скоте.На данное время имеет две большие коровы и 20 барашков.Его жена хорошая доярка, поэтому взяв займ он хочет купить две буренки для того чтобы иметь свое молоко .Раньше у него были коровы которые дают молоко,но затем они их продали и купили мелкорогатый скот.

loans.use: Purchase of two milk cows

loans.name: Rik

texts.en: Mrs. Rik K., who is 20, is a mother of a little child who works as a house wife and cook for her family. To help her family to earn a better life, her husband Mr. Song Sean, who is 23, is a souvenirs vendor at the Bayon temple and makes about $5 per day. To get a more convenient ride to work, the couple would like a $500 loan from Kiva to purchase a motor.

loans.use: Hope to use this loan to purchase a motor for commute.

loans.name: Sabankul

texts.ru:
Sabankul Ziyaevich H. lives in the city of Yavan. He is 45 years old, married and has 6 children. He has a college education and is an agriculturist by profession. He is currently unemployed. Sabankul is in the business of buying and selling of calves. His experience in this field is 10 years. He plans to use the loan to buy more calves to feed them and then to resell. This business is the main source of income for his family. The development of the farming sector also allows to supply the local residents with meat. He plans to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Хасанов Сабанкул Зияевич житель города Яван.Возраст 45 лет , женат имеет 6 детей.Образование высшее. По снециальности Огроном. В данный момент без работы. Занимается купле продажей бычков. Опыт работы 10 лет.Кредит планирует использовать на покупку бычков, откормки и последующей реализацией. Этот бизнес является основным источником дохода его семьи. Так же развитие сельхоз сектора позволяет обеспечить население мясом. Погасить кредит планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy two calves

loans.name: Gulmahmad

texts.ru:
Gulmahmad Bobonazarovich U. lives in the city of Yavan. He is 39 years old, married and has 4 children. He has a High School education. He is in the business of growing plants, in particular vegetables. He has been in this business for the past 10 years. He plans to use the loan to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer. This business is the main source of income for the family and helps providing the local population with fresh vegetables. Gulmahmad plans to repay the loan in 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Юлдошев Гулмахмад Бобоназарович житель города Яван.Возраст 39 лет , женат имеет 4 детей.Образование среднее.Занимается растениеводством. Сажает овощи. Опыт работы 10 лет.Кредит планирует использовать на покупку семян картофеля и удобрений.Этот бизнес является основным источником дохода его семьи. Так же развитие сельхоз сектора позволяет обеспечить население свежими овощами.Погасить кредит планирует в течении 12 месяцев .

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Som

texts.en: Mrs. Som B., who is 53, is married with five children and works as a housewife cooking food for her family. She also owns a plot of land growing a variety of crops which everyday allows her to earn a little less than $1 per day . Her husband works as a security guard at the Bayon temple and makes about $1 per day. The four children work as security guards at Angkor Wat and typically earn $2 per day. This couple hopes to use this loan to purchase a water pump to water the crops as it is difficult in dry season without water. They are requesting a loan $500.

loans.use: This couple hopes to ues this loan to purchase a water pump.

loans.name: Chon

texts.en: Mrs. Chon S., 43, is a widow living with 4 children who stays at home doing her house work. With her business she opened , a pharmacy makes on average around $5 a day of income. To pay for the daily expenses, two of her children are employed by garment factories with salaries of $90 a month. Mrs. Chon S. is requesting a loan to purchase more medicines to sell. This loan is about $1000.

loans.use: Mrs. Chon Sony is requesting a loan to purchase more medicines.

loans.name: Lukoto East G Group

texts.en:
The group leader of this small group is Rose N.. She is currently in the business of selling cabbages and is requesting a loan to add to her business. Rose is 32 years old and is married. Her husband is a coffee trader. She has 7 children ranging from age 5 to 18 and her children go to school. Each week, Rose makes approximately UGX 9500 in profits and with the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to add more capital to the business. Rose has taken a loan from BRAC Uganda before in the amount of UGX 150000 in order to add to the business and the loan was paid back on time.

Rose is joined in her small group by Edith N., Lucy Namugere, Monica K., and Teopista N.. Edith N. has a business in coffee selling and wants to boost business. Lucy Namugere is currently operating a business selling vegetables and wants a loan to add capital. Monica K. operates a business of cabbage selling and wants to uplift business. Teopista N. is currently in the business of operating a hotel and is requesting a loan to add to the business and provide better quality services.

loans.use: To boost vegetable business

loans.name: Ravshan

texts.en: Ravshan B. is 24 years old and lives in the J.Rasulov region of Tajikistan. Mr. B. is engaged in the family business of raising and selling livestock . He has a large herd and a pedigree milk-cow that permits him and his wife to produce milk-sour products to sell. Now Mr. B. is applying for a business development loan to trade outlet opening for selling the home-made milk-sour products.

loans.use: To trade on home-made milk-sour products.

loans.name: Ni Made Yartini

texts.id:
Ni Made Yartini’s family lives on a tight budget. Her husband, I Komang Wardana, is currently working as a chauffeur/driver with monthly earnings of Rp. 500,000 (USD equivalent $54). This income is not sufficient for their needs.

Ni Made Yartini has three children; the first is in elementary school, the second is four years old and the third is an infant. Ni Made Yartini has secured the trust of Yayasan Dinari (Kiva partner organization supporting this listing) and in borrowing funds. Over time, she has used the funds to equip her goods stall by buying rice, a variety of light snacks, soaps, detergent and various cakes. With the aforementioned funds she has also purchased a sunglass/eyeglass rack costing Rp 1.500,000 (USD equivalent $163). Almost every day Ni Made Yartini goes shopping in the Negara market to add to her stock of goods as well as to replenish those items that sold. With daily earnings as much as Rp.30,000 – Rp. 50,000 (USD equivalent $3 - $5) she is able to add enough to the family income. Ni Made Yartini is hopeful that she can continue her efforts in this business and expand it.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Aarati, Kiva volunteer.

Kehidupan rumah tangga Ni Made Yartini pas-pasan, suaminya, I Komang Wardana, saat ini bekerja sebagai seorang sopir dengan penghasilan setiap bulan Rp.500.000,- jumlah ini tentulah tidak mencukupi biaya kebutuhan hidup mereka. Ni Made Yartini mempunyai 3 orang anak,yang pertama sekolah tingkat dasar, yang kedua baru berumur 4 tahun dan yang terakhir masih berumur 6 bulan. Ni Made Yartini mendapat kepercayaan Yayasan Dinari dan memperoleh pinjaman dana. Dengan dana ini Ni Made Yartini pergunakan untuk menambah modal usaha warungnya. Sedikit demi sedikit dipakai untuk melengkapi warung dengan membeli beras, aneka macam makanan ringan , aneka sabun mandi, deterjen dan aneka macam kue. Dengan dana tersebut juga dipakai untuk membeli rak kaca dengan harga Rp.1.500.000,- Hampir setiap hari Ni Made Yartini berbelaja di pasar Negara untuk melengkapi dan menambah barang yang sudah berkurang karena laku terjual. Dengan keuntungan sebesar Rp.30.000 s/d Rp.50.000.- setiap harinya cukup untuk menambah pendapatan keluarga. Ni Made Yartini tetap berharap usaha ini bisa terus berjalan dan juga berkembang menjadi lebih besar lagi.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to diversify inventory

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.en: Khosiyat G. was born in 1964 in the J.Rasulov region; now she is married and has four children. Khosiyat is engaged in the business of the raising and selling livestock, and making milk products. She has eight years of experience in the business, so she has the appropriate skills and knowledge. It is a family business that brings the general family income. Now Khosiyat is applying for a business development loan to purchase a pedigree bull.

loans.use: purchasing a pedigree bull

loans.name: Sayu Kadek Lastri

texts.id:
Sayu Kadek Lastri is a resilient woman and she never stops to rest. Each day Sayu works hard to help her husband add to their family earnings. Her husband Putu Suatra works as a contract farmer, and so his job is not stable. Through their Tempek group (a traditional organization) in their village, Sayu Kadek Lastri has received a loan from Yayasan Dinari (Kiva partner organization coordinating this listing). With these funds she has purchased female cows with the hope that in the future she will get the cows to birth calves. In addition, the funds were used to buy three pigs. After raising them for three months, the plan is to sell two and keep one for breeding. Each day Sayu Kadek Lastri tends to and cares for her cows and pigs.The calf would only need to be fed grass and tender green leaves that are readily available in Sayu’s garden. For her pigs, Sayu has to buy bran grains and feed mixture. The hope is that within three months the pigs are ready for sale with an estimated price of Rp.1,800,000 (USD equivalent $196) for two. The net gain in those three months could reach Rp.500,000 (USD equivalent 54), and she could use that income to fulfill her family’s needs. Her hope for the future is that her efforts with the cows and pigs will pay off for the family.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Aarati, Kiva volunteer.

Sayu Kadek Lastri adalah seroang ibu rumah tangga yang ulet dan tidak pernah tinggal diam saja. Setiap hari Sayu bekerja keras membantu suaminya untuk dapat memperoleh penghasilan tambahan. Suaminya, Putu Suatra, bekerja sebagi petani upahan yang pekerjaan tidak tetap. Melalui kelompok Tempek ( organisasi adat ) didesanya, Sayu Kadek Lastri mendapat pinjaman dana dari Yayasan Dinari. Dengan dana ini Sayu Kadek Lastri membeli sapi betina dengan harapan kedepan nanti dapat mendapatkan anak sapi dari sapinya. Selain itu dana tersebut dibelikan 3 ekor babi penggemukan yang rencananya akan djual setelah dipelihara 3 bulan dan satu ekor akan dijadikan induk babi. Setiap hari Sayu Kadek Lastri memelihara dan merawat sapi dan 3 ekor babinya. Anak sapi hanya diberi makan rumput dan daun hijau yang mudah didapat di kebunnya. Untuk babinya Sayu Kadek Lastri harus membeli dedak padi dan konsentrat sebagai campurannya dengan harapan dalam 3 bulan babi siap dijual dengan perkiraan harga Rp.1.800.000,-.untuk dua ekor. Keuntungan bersih dalam setiap tiga bulan bisa mencapai Rp.500.000,- dan dari keuntungan yang didapat dipergunakan untuk mencukupi keperluan keluarganya. Harapan kedepannya agar usaha ternak sapi dan babinya dapat menguntungkan.

loans.use: To buy pigs and pig feed

loans.name: Muhamadsharif

texts.en: Muhamadsharif G. is 63 years old and lives in Khujand, where he has a business selling children's clothes. Muhamadsharif first applied to the MicroInvest in 2003 when he was in a difficult business situation, which he improved thanks to the loans. The business and income stability helped him to return the previous loans and to arrange the business so it brings a good income. Now he's requesting a loan to purchase more inventory.

loans.use: Purchasing new goods

loans.name: Muguluka West A Group

texts.en:
The group leader of this small group is Ziyada K.. She is currently in the business of selling sugar wax and is requesting a loan to add to her business. Ziyada is 39 years old and is married. Her husband has a maize milling business. She has 6 children ranging from age 6 to 23 and her children go to school. Each week, Ziyada makes approximately UGX 23000 in profits and with the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to educate the children and invest more into her business. Ziyada has taken a loan from BRAC Uganda before in the amount of UGX 350000 in order to boost the business and the loan was paid back on time.

Ziyada is joined in her small group by Florence N., Rose W., Zaituni K., and Saida N.. Florence N. has a business in used clothing sales and wants to increase working capital. Rose W. is currently operating a business selling cold soft drinks and wants a loan to purchase a fridge. Zaituni K. operates a business selling sugar wax and wants to boost business. Saida N. is currently in the business of running a retail shop and is requesting a loan to increase the stock of items.

loans.use: To add to sugar business and expand it

loans.name: Ni Kadek Sulastri

texts.id:
Ni Kadek Sulastri has been skilled in making Canang Sari (Hindunese prayer aid). This skill was obtained from her parents who also sold Canang Saris. Besides making daily prayer supplies, Ni Kadek Sulastri also make larger scale prayer supplies, like for wedding and other major Hindu feasts. When she gets major order, she hires temporary workers to help. From her village's local group, Ni Kadek Sulasti applied for loan from DINARI foundation. This fund is needed to expand her business so she can increase her business capacity. Almost every day, Ni Kadek SUlastri purchases coconut leaves and flowers in the market for her business needs. Ni Kadek Sulastri has regular suppliers in "Negara" maret. She spends about $11 every day to purchase ingredients, and she earns about $16.5 in sales daily, so she earns $5.50 profit daily. This profit was used to pay for her family's daily needs.

Translated from Indonesian by kresna Hartandi, Kiva Volunteer

Ni Kadek Sulastri sejak kecil sudah terampil membuat Canang Sari ( sarana persembahyangan umat Hindu ). Ketrampilan ini didapat dari orang tuanya yang juga adalah seorang penjual Canang Sari. Selain membuat untuk sarana sembahyangan sehari- hari, Ni Kadek Sulastri juga melayani untuk sarana sembahyangan dalam jumlah besar seperti perkawinan dan juga upacara adat Hindu yang lainnya. Jika Ni kadek sulastri mendapatkan pesanan yang banyak maka ia akan mencari tenaga kerja harian. Melalui kelompok yang ada didesanya Ni Kadek Sulastri mendapat Modal pinjaman dari Yayasan Dinari. Modal ini sangat dibutuhkan untuk menunjang di dalam usahanya untuk memenuhi dan melengkapi bahan baku. Hampir setiap hari Ni Kadek Sulastri membeli beraneka macam bunga dan janur di pasar untuk keperluan usahanya. Ni Kadek Sulastri mempunyai pelanggan bunga tetap yang setiap hari menjual bunga di pasar Negara. Modal yang dihabiskan setiap hari dapat mencapai Rp.100.000,-. Pendapatan kotor dapat mencapai Rp.150.000,-.dengan keuntungan Rp.50.000,- setiap harinya. Dari keuntungan ini dipergunakan untuk mencukupi keperluan keluarganya.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients, e.g. flowers and coconut leaves

loans.name: Ni Wayan Kanten

texts.id:
Ni Wayan Kanten is famous in her village as a seller of sesajen (Hindunese prayer aid/offerings made of coconut leaves and flowers) that is used usually in "Ngaben" ceremony (cremation) and marriage. Ni Wayan Kanten's has many clients, from her neighbors to surrounding villagers. This is because Ni Wayan Kanten is famous for the quality and cheap price of her products. Ni Wayan Kanten tries to fill smaller orders, but she gets two temporary daily workers when she gets bigger orders. For small batch, she can spend about $4.40 in cost to get $11 revenue. With $6.60 daily profit , Ni Wayan kanten owns 10 Canang Sari clientsdaily. Every client buys 100 Canang Sari for $1.10 per 100 pieces. For bigger orders, she gets more profit. She plans to use the loan to purchase more ingredients to buy more ingredients so she can step up production.

Translated from Indonesian by Kresna Hartandi, Kiva Volunteer

Ni Wayan Kanten sudah terkenal di desanya sebagi penjual Sesajen ( salah satu sarana persembahyangan umat Hindu yang tebuat dari bungan dan daun kelapa miuda ) yang biasanya dipergunakan oleh umat Hindu sebagai sarana persembahyangan baik untuk upacara Ngaben ( upacara bakar mayat ) maupun untuk pernikahan. Pelanggan Ni Wayan Kanten cukup banyak, mulai dari masyarakat yang ada disekitar tempat tinggalnya sampai ke desa –desa tetangga yang jauh dari rumahnya. Hal ini dikarenakan Ni Wayan Kanten sudah terkenal dengan hasil produksinya yang baik dan harganya terjangkau. Jika jumlah pesanan sedikit maka Ni Wayan Kanten kerjakan sendiri, tetapi jika dalam jumlah yang banyak maka Ni Wayan Kanten dibantu oleh dua orang tenaga kerja yang diberi upah harian. Dalam sehari jumlah biaya yang dikeluarkan Rp. 40.000,- untuk biaya produksi dalam partai kecil dengan penghasilan Rp 100.000. Dengan keuntungan tiap hari mencapai Rp. 60.000,- NiWayan Kanten memiliki 10 pelanggan Canang Sari setiap hari. Setiap pelanggan membeli 100 buah canang sari dengan harga Rp.10.000 untuk 100 biji. Jika ada pesanan dalam jumlah banyak atau partai besar maka keuntungan yang didapat akan meningkat. Dari modal yang didapat ini dipergunakan untuk membeli bahan baku dalam usahanya.

loans.use: Purchase goods to be sold like flowers and coconut

loans.name: Moa

texts.en:
Mrs. Moa H., 39, works selling charcoal and wood that she buys from nearby communities and resells them to other places. Each day she can make around $2 of  income. Her husband is currently employed by a tourist company earning $1 each day and five of her children work selling a variety of souvenir products near Prey Angkor. 
Mrs. Moa H. has requested this loan to expand her business, buying a large quantity of wood to keep her profit up to repair her house to prevent flooding and leakage during  rainstorms.

loans.use: To reinvest her busines and repair her house.

payments.comment: Congratulation! Your Kiva loan has been repaid early. Thank you for interest helping Cambodian entrepreneurs like Moa Him and sustain their business. Your loan has made them different. We do hope that you will continue support the poor entrepreneurs in Cambodia through CREDIT MFI in the future. Best Regard, Vichet Ouch, Kiva Coordinator at CREDIT MFI, Phnom Penh Office.

loans.name: Ni Ketut Remi

texts.id:
Ni Ketut Remi farms cattles. She started her business with only one cow. Utilizing the loan, she plans to purchase another cow, preferably a large and pregnant cow. Every morning, after finishing her household chores, Ni Ketut Remi goes to neighborhood filed to find grasses and leaves to feed the cattles. She hopes that this additional funding will also increase her income. With one cow, she gains about $270 profit. So with another cow, she hopes to double her earnings. Ni Ketut Remi is thankful and passionate in this business despite the small scale. However, she is optimistic that her business will expand.

Translated from Indonesian by Kresna Hartandi, Kiva Volunteer

Mata pencaharian Ni Ketut Remi adalah memelihara sapi. Awalnya Ni Ketut Remi hanya memiliki satu ekor sapi. Namun sekarang, dari dana pinjaman yang diperolehnya dipergunakan untuk membeli tambahan 1 ekor sapi lagi yang sudah besar dan sedang hamil 6 bulan. Setiap pagi setelah menyelesaikan pekerjaan rumah tangganya, Ni Ketut Remi mulai ke kebun untuk mencari rumput atau dedaunan sebagai makanan ternaknya. Dengan modal ini nantinya diharapkan agar jumlah penghasilannya bisa bertambah karena yang dulunya hanya memelihara satu ekor saja dengan keuntungan Rp 2.500.000 per ekor kini sudah bertambah menjadi dua ekor. Ni Ketut Remi senantiasa bersyukur dan tidak patah semangat untuk menekuni usaha ini walaupun skalanya masih kecil. Namun ia optimis usahanya ini akan bertambah besar.

loans.use: Purchase Cattles

loans.name: Muguluka West B Group

texts.en:
The group leader of this small group is K. Rebecca. She is currently in the business of operating a hotel and is requesting a loan to purchase more hotel equipment. K. is 38 years old and is divorced. She has 4 children ranging from age 6 to 18 and her children go to school. Each week, K. makes approximately UGX 31000 in profits and with the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to invest more in her business. K. has taken a loan from BRAC Uganda before in the amount of UGX 350000 in order to add to her business and the loan was paid back on time.

K. is joined in her small group by Doreen K., Suzan M., Ruth N., and Zirab M.. Doreen K. has a business selling sugar wax and wants to boost business. Suzan M. is currently operating a retail shop business and wants a loan to increase stock. Ruth N. operates a business of used clothing sales and wants to add capital. Zirab M. is currently a bar attendant and is requesting a loan to start another business.

loans.use: To add to hotel business and improve it

loans.name: Safia's Group

texts.en:
My name is Safia W. and I am 38 years old and the mother of seven children: three girls and four boys. My husband is an auto mechanic and I am a textile designer who makes embroidered clothes. I sell these clothes in my boutique, and will use this loan to increase my family's income by expanding my shop. With the profits I make, I plan to buy a washing machine for my house.

I lead a group of two women who are my neighbors. We have been together for quite a few years. Alia S. creates embroidered outfits. Maqsoodan B. is an artist who creates paintings. All three of us will use our share of loan to expand our family's business.

loans.use: To expand three family businesses

loans.name: Rukia's Kichangani B Group

texts.en:
Rukia O., age 38, is widowed with two children (age 12 and 7 years old). Rukia owns a vegetable stand that she started 1 year ago. Working from 7am-9pm daily, she earns about $55 a month from this business.

Rukia hopes to receive a loan in order to buy more vegetables that she can sell. Rukia belongs to the loan group called Kichangani B and will be sharing this loan with subgroup members Miza A., Mariam R., and Mariam A.. These women have businesses dealing in food vending and fish sales.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables

loans.name: Putu Purnamayanti

texts.id:
Putu Purnamayanti has been married for 15 years. Her husband is a security guard working for a private company. Putu Purnamyanti's husband makes about $88 per month. Putu Purnamayanti has 2 children, the eldest, Gusti Putu Purwanjaya, is 13 year old and currently in junior high school. THe second child, Gusti Kade Aroprasetya is 9 year old and is still in primary school. Putu Purnamayanti currently is working with her own kiosk business that sells various traditional Balinese food and snacks and local favorites. She started the business using her savings. Currently, Purnamayanti is applying to obtain a loan for business expansion from DINARI. Everyday, Purnamayant spends about $11 to purchase her goods to sell, and gets about $17 in revenue, so she gets $6 profit daily. Putu Purnamayanti is going to be grateful if she can get the loan so she can expand her business.

Translated form Indonesian by Kresna Hartandi, Kiva Volunteer

Putu Purnamayanti berkeluarga sudah 15 tahun . Suaminya bekerja sebagai seorang Satpam di sebuah perusahaan swasta. Penghasilan suami Purnamayanti per bulan Rp. 800,000,-. Putu Purnamayanti memiliki 2 orang anak yang pertama bernama Gusti Putu Purwanjaya berumur 13 tahun duduk di bangku SMP. Anak yang nomor 2 bernama Gusti Kade Ariprasetya umur 9 tahun duduk dibangku SD.
