Juana plans on using her loan to buy more products so that she can increase her sales volume and thus her income. Juana says she will keep working for the sake of her family.

loans.use: To purchase beauty products for resale.

loans.name: Irma Del Socorro

texts.es:
Irma, being a single mother, decided to start her own business out of necessity for the sustainment of her 4 children. She opened up a beverage business 12 years ago, with which she covered certain expenses but not in their entirety. That is why Irma decided to seek financing and started selling clothing and perfumes. This activity allowed her to nourish and educate all her children.

With the passing of time, Irma has been able to diversify the products she sells and markets. She still has the beverage business at home, where she also sells ice cream, cookies and candies as well as clothing and footwear. She offers all of these products to her neighbors, friends, relatives and the general public. The goal is to increase her earnings, allowing her to expand her business and improve hers and her family’s living conditions. For that reason, she is requesting a loan that will let her buy fruits to prepare the beverages and ice creams that she creates herself, as well as invest in clothing, perfumes and colognes for men and women.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Irma siendo madre soltera decide emprender su propio negocio como una necesidad de subsistencia en la que debía de mantener a sus 4 hijos e inicia hace 12 años una refresquería, con la cual pagaba ciertos gastos pero no cubría la totalidad,es por eso que doña Irma decide buscar un financiamiento y empieza a comprar y vender ropa, perfume, fue esta actividad la que le permitió alimentar y educar a todos sus hijos.

Al pasar de los años la señora ha podido diversificar un poco los productos que vende y comercializa, en su casa tiene todavía la refresquería, vende helados y galletas, golosinas así como también ropa y zapatos, todos estos productos los ofrece a sus vecinas, amigas, familiares y publico en general. La meta es la de aumentar sus ganancias, permitiéndole de esa forma hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su núcleo familiar. Es por eso, que solicita un préstamo para comprar frutas para preparar los refrescos y helados que ella misma elabora, así como invertir en ropa y perfume para damas y caballero.

loans.use: Purchase fruits, clothing, perfumes and cologne.

loans.name: Diana Amelia

texts.en:
Diana Amelia is a thirty-eight-year-old businesswoman whose passion is beautifying the girls and women around her. She owns and operates a beauty salon that she started ten years ago in the Los Alcarrizos community of Santo Domingo. Her salon offers hair styling, manicures, hair washing, pedicures, hair straightening and so forth. Diana Amelia says that generally she has 10 customers a day during the weekdays and during the week-ends, especially on Saturdays, she can serve more than 15 persons a day.

Diana Amelia plans on using the loan to buy a large amount of beauty products to keep operating her beauty parlor. She will alsouse some of the stock for resale to her customers.

loans.use: To purchase beauty products for a small beauty salon.

loans.name: Leticia Verónica

texts.es:
Leticia is a young entrepreneur of 27 years of age. She has been interested in business all of her life and had the chance to start her own small business 5 years ago, which consists of selling a variety of clothing for men and women, perfumes and cosmetics as well as school books. This entrepreneurial initiative has been very helpful in covering her family’s expenses, being that with it she has managed to live in a dignified manner and bring up her 2 small children, offering them a higher quality of life.

She sells her products as a peddler, visiting office centers, banks and universities, where she counts with a strong customer base. At this time, the business requires her to increase the amount of products available, being that she has some orders of men’s clothing in which she needs to invest. In the future, she wishes to have her own store so that she does not need to leave her home, and so she can be closer to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Leticia es una joven empresaria de 27 años de edad, toda su vida le ha gustado los negocios, hace 5 años tuvo la posibilidad de emprender su micro negocio, el cual consiste en vender ropa variada para hombres y mujeres, perfumes,cosméticos, así como también libros escolares, esta iniciativa de negocio le ha sido de mucha aporte para enfrentar los gastos familiares, ya que con su negocio ha logrado vivir dignamente y sacar adelante a sus 2 pequeños hijos ofreciéndoles una mejor calidad de vida. Ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante, visita centros de trabajo, bancos y universidades, en donde cuenta con un buen número de personas que le compran. En estos momentos el negocio requiere aumentar la cantidad de productos, ya que la señora tiene ciertos encargos de ropa de caballero en donde necesita invertir. En un futuro desea llegar a tener su tienda en la cual ya no tenga que andar fuera del hogar y así estar más cerca de sus hijos.

loans.use: Purchase perfumes, cologne, shirts, jeans, shorts and women's undergarments.

loans.name: Aldo Alberto

texts.es:
Aldo is a young businessman who is 27-years-old. He is from Siuna in the Autónoma Atlántica Norte region. He has lived all of his life in Costa Atlántica with his parents, who have given him everything that he needed that was possible for them. Since he was young, he has had a passion for technology and computers. He trained as much as he could and, with a lot of effort, finished his education. He decided to move to Managua to search for better living conditions, to get ahead, to support his parents, and to start his business.

Two years ago, he started a small internet café in Villa Venezuela. It has services of renting computers, making international and domestic calls, and making photocopies. He attends his store every day of the week, finding himself in charge of his business. Right now the internet café needs an expansion so he can offer fax and scanner services and include a small bookstore where his customers, who are mainly high school and college students, can meet when they need to. This is why Aldo is requesting a loan to be able to purchase the necessary equipment and materials to offer his customers this service that is so much in demand.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

Aldo es un Joven emprendedor de 27 años, soltero, originario de Siuna, Región Autónoma Atlántica Norte (RAAN), toda su vida ha vivido en la Costa Atlántica con sus padres quienes le han brindado lo necesario de acuerdo a sus posibilidades. Desde muy joven le apasionó la tecnología y las computadoras, se preparó de acuerdo a sus posibilidades y con mucho esfuerzo pudo terminar sus estudios, decide trasladarse a vivir a Managua para buscar mejor condición de vida, salir adelante, apoyar a sus padres y emprender su negocio.

Hace 2 años monto un pequeño Cyber Café en Villa Venezuela con los servicios de alquiler de computadoras, llamadas nacionales e internacionales y fotocopias, atendiendo todos los días a la semana, encontrándose él a cargo de su negocio. Actualmente el Cyber Café requiere de una expansión en cuanto a los servicios que ofrece como son servicios de Fax, Scanner, así como el de montar una pequeña librería en el cual sus clientes quienes mayormente son estudiantes de colegios y universidades puedan encontrar lo que necesitan. Es por eso que el joven Aldo solicita un préstamo para poder comprar los equipos y materiales necesarios para ofrecer a sus clientes que tanto demandan de dicho servicio.

loans.use: To purchase equipment and materials for his internet café

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Doña Rosa lives in the community of Sabana Grande, which is a rural area. Its inhabitants have scace economic resources and live humbly. In the last 18 years, she has made a living by selling used clothing in her home, which has been a favorable alternative for her neighbors, friends, and people from surrounding towns in terms of acquiring clothing.

The clothing that she sells is American, of good quality, and low in price. Every week she buys a package of varied clothing or a package of one specific garment. Her business has let her educate her two children. One is in elementary school, and one is in college. Doña Rosa hopes to buy a package of linens, because her neighbors have asked her for this on several occasions, but right now she doesn't offer this type of product.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

Doña Rosa habita en la comunidad Sabana Grande, zona rural, los pobladores son de escasos recursos económicos, viven humildemente. En los últimos 18 años se ha dedicado a vender ropa usada en su casa de habitación, la cual ha sido una alternativa favorable en cuanto a la adquisión de prendas de vestir para vecinos, amigos y pobladores de los alrededores.

La ropa que vende es americana, de buena calidad y a precios muy bajos, cada semana compra una paca de ropa variada o ya sea de una determinada prenda en específico. Su negocio le ha permitido educar a sus 2 hijos quiénes se encuentra estudiando en primaria y el otro en la universidad. La señora desea comprar una paca de ropa de cama, ya que sus vecinos le han encargado en varias ocasiones y actualmente no ofrece ese tipo de prendas.

loans.use: Purhchase of a package of used linens

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Before selling food in her home, Rosa made a living by selling sandwiches at a bus stop. Even though the stop was close to her house, taking the sandwich cart there and returning it to her house was very tiring. She stopped doing this because at night she had terrible back pain. She needed to educate her 11-year-old son, though, so she opened the doors of her home to start selling food. She happily had clients who knew her, so she never lacked anyone to make food for. In addition to selling food in her house, she also delivers orders to those who need them. In this way, she stays busy all day. Nevertheless, she is looking for a way to construct a restaurant where she can receive more clients and have the opportunity to give her youngest son a college education. He is the only person who lives with her.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

Antes de vender comida en su casa, Rosa se dedicaba a la venta de sandwiches en un paradero de autobuses. A pesar que quedaba cerca a su casa, el llevar ella misma el carrito sanguchero a su destino y regresar con el a su casa la cansaba. Termino por desistir de continuar en ello, pues por las noches sentía un malestar terrible en su columna. La necesidad de ver estudiando a su hijo de once años hizo que hace dos años abriera las puertas de su casa para empezar a vender menúes. Felizmente contaba con clientes que ya la conocían, así que nunca le falto a quien servir. Además de vender en su casa ella también lleva a pedido a quienes lo requieran. De este modo, se mantiene ocupada durante todo el día. No obstante, ella busca la manera de construir un restaurante donde pueda recibir más clientes y tener la oportunidad de darle estudios universitarios a su menor hijo, que es la única persona con la que vive.

loans.use: To begin construction on her restaurant

loans.name: Carmen María

texts.en:
Carmen María, a kind woman with a hearty laugh, sells fashionable pants and beauty products to the women in the Los Alcarrizos community of Santo Domingo. Carmen is twenty-nine years old and has two sons and one daughter, all of whom attend school. Carmen’s business supports her children's education.

Carmen wants to expand her business and increase her sales volume. She will use her loan to buy new products and more pants to add to her stock. That way, she will make her business more attractive and get new clients.

loans.use: To diversify and expand a small clothing business

loans.name: Bertha Luz

texts.es:
Mrs.Bertha lives in Mariscal Cáceres province in the Juanqui District. She is a semstress creating clothes for men and women. Her business is located in her home. Mrs.Bertha is 45 years old, a mother of four (three of which are still at home) and her husband is an elderly man with very frail health.

Mrs.Bertha began her business six years ago when her husband fell ill and they found themselves without a source of income. One of her children was studying in the university at the time and she had to find a way to maintain her home and help her son continue with his studies. A friend recommended her for the "Honesty and Work" group where she obtained her first loan and began to work as a seamstress.

Her last loan will be repaid in 6 months and she will use the money to purchase raw materials to create her apparel. She wants to purchase an overlocker sewing machine and may purchase prefabricated clothes as well.

In the future she would like to open a boutique to showcase her creations.

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.

loans.use: Purchase an overlocker sewing machine

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith has always worked doing the tasks of the home. Due to the recommendations of some of her friends, she decided to sell beauty products through a catalog. She has been doing this for four years and does not regret having started it.

Thanks to the income, which is still considered very basic, she can help her husband in maintaining their home and raising their two small children. At 36 years old, her idea is the open a store in the future where she can sell many more of her beauty products. For now she seeks to increase the order stock. For this she would need $350.

Translated from Spanish by Lauren Conover, kiva.org volunteer. Edith siempre se ha dedicado a los quehaceres del hogar. A causa de las recomendaciones de unas amigas suyas decidió vender productos de belleza por catálogo. Ella ya lleva cuatro años en este negocio y no se arrepiente de haberse animado al inicio. Gracias a sus ingresos que aún considera son muy básicos, puede ayudar a su esposo con el sostén de su casa y la crianza de sus dos pequeños hijos. A sus 36 años la idea de ella es abrir en un futuro una tienda donde pueda vender sus productos de belleza pero por mayor cantidad. Por ahora ella busca aumentar el stock de pedidos, para ello necesitaría $350.

loans.use: To increase the stock of products to sell

loans.name: Usumacinta 2 Group

texts.es:
Two years ago, Josefa started a small grocery store in her house, where she sells rice, sugar, oil, cookies, soft drinks, pasta, etc. With her loan, she will invest in purchasing more products to stock her store and thus be able to satisfy her clients. She is 48-years-old and has 4 children. She is a member of the Usumacinta 2 group. The other members are doña Dolores D. Pérez, who sells food; Rosa R. D. and Esperanza de Jesús C. R., who sell clothing; and Rosalinda C. R. and Manuela A. Pérez, who are seamstresses.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

JOSEFA DESDE HACE DOS AÑOS INSTALO EN SU CASA UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA DE ABARROTES EN DONDE VENDE ARROZ, AZUCAR, ACEITE, GALLETAS, REFRESCOS, PASTAS, ETC. CON SU PRESTAMO INVERTIRA EN COMPRAR MAS PRODUCTOS PARA ABASTECER SU TIENDA Y DE ESTA FORMA PODER SATISFACER A SUS CLIENTES. ELLA TIENE 48 AÑOS, CUATRO HIJOS Y FORMA PARTE DEL GRUPO SOLIDARIO USUMACINTA 2, JUNTO CON DOÑA DOLORES D. PÉREZ (VENTA DE COMIDA), ROSA R. D. Y ESPERANZA DE JESUS C. R. (VENTA DE ROPA), ROSALINDA C. R. Y MANUELA A. PÉREZ (COSTURERAS).

loans.use: Grocery store

loans.name: Tres Pinos 1 Group

texts.es:
Silvia is 44 years old, a mother of four and has been selling perfumes and bed throws over the last five years. Her earnings are used to support her family and purchase stock for her business.

With the micro loan she will purchase more stock to increase her sales. The other group members are: Rosalida A. Pérez (grocery sales), Mercedes S. S. (fruit and vegetable sales)

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.

loans.use: Purchase stock

loans.name: Petalo 1 Group

texts.es:
Luz Mireya is a member of the support group Petalo 1. Luz and her husband have been selling refreshments in the work camps near their village over the past 8 years. Mrs.Mireya is 38 years old, has three children and she is requesting the loan to purchase more refreshments. With more stock she hopes to increase her income to maintain her family and keep her business going.

The other group members are: Candelaria D. G. (poultry sales), Virgelina G. Perez (silver jewellery sales), Felipa D. Jesus H. C. and Flor Maria A. R. (clothing sales).

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.

loans.use: Purchase refreshments

loans.name: Maria Rafaela

texts.es:
María lost her previous employment when the street vendor area was removed by the Town Hall. She decided to purchase a stall in the market near her home.

This was ten years ago, and she is very proud of her accomplishments as a businesswoman. Her clothes stall is one of the largest in the market and she has a loyal client base.

María´s dream is to purchase a fleet of vehicles to create a taxi company. Recently she purchased a new taxi which her son-in-law is driving. Soon she will purchase her second cab. María is 62 years old, but she is full of vitality and wants to see her dream fulfilled with her daughter.

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.

loans.use: Downpayment for a new taxi

loans.name: Tres Pinos 2 Group

texts.es:
Martha was born in Ocosingo and is 43 years old. She has been sewing since she was 6 years old, making all kids of clothing. With this business she has been able to provide for her children. With the current loan she wishes to buy supplies to make her clothing (thread, fabric, needles, buttons). The other members of the group are: Rosa S. C. who has a grocery store, Maria G. V. who buys and sells bread, Maria de los Angeles L. Hernandes who is going to start a clothing selling business, Maria del Socorro D. who sells prepared food.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

DOÑA MARTHA COMO TODOS LA CONOCEN EN OCOSINGO TIENE 43 AÑOS DE EDAD, DESDE LOS 6 AÑOS DE EDAD SE DEDICA A LA COSTURA, CONFECCIONA TODO TIPO DE ROPA, CON ESTE OFICIO HA PODIDO SACAR ADELANTE A SUS 4 HIJOS, CON EL CREDITO DECEA COMPRAR MATERIAL PARA REALIZAR SU TRABAJO(HILOS, TELAS, AGUJAS, BOTONES), LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO SON, ROSA S. C. TIENE UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES, MARIA G. V., COMPRA Y VENDE PAN, MARIA DE LOS ANGELES L. HERNANDES VA A INICIAR VENTA DE ROPA, MARIA DEL SOCORRO D., VENDE COMIDA TIPICA(ANTOJITOS).

loans.use: Buy supplies (thread, needles, buttons, fabric).

loans.name: Usumacinta 1 Group

texts.es:
Maria is 36 years old, has three children, and her business is preparing various typical regional dishes. She has this business in her home, and she sells three times per week. With the loan she plans on expanding her business. Her income is used for her family’s expenses. She is part of the Usumacinta 1 Group, together with her colleagues: Bertha P. A. (sells food), Esther Guadalupe (sells perfumes and cosmetics), Concepcion R. D. (sells clothing), Maria Cruz R. P. and Maria Ofelia D. P. (seamstresses).

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

MARIA TIENE 36 AÑOS, TRES HIJOS, SE DEDICA A PREPARAR DISTINTOS PLATILLOS TIPICOS DE LA REGION. NEGOCIO QUE TIENE INSTALADO EN SU CASA, VENDE TRES VECES POR SEMANA, CON EL CREDITO PRETENDE AMPLIAR EL NEGOCIO, SUS GANANCIAS SON UTILIZADAS PARA LOS GASTOS FAMILIARES. ELLA FORMA PARTE DEL GRUPO USUMACINTA 1, JUNTO CON SUS COMPAÑERAS: BERTHA PÉREZ A. (VENTA D COMIDA), ESTHER GUADALUPE (VENTA DE PERFUMES Y COSMETICOS) CONCEPCION R. D. (VENTA DE ROPA), MARIA CRUZ R. PÉREZ Y MARIA OFELIA D. PÉREZ (COSTURERAS).

loans.use: Sell food.

loans.name: Zocima

texts.es:
Zocima started her business transporting food from Huaraz. She sold on the streets goods like: potatoes, lúcuma (a small apple-like fruit which grows in Peru and Chile), onions and oranges. Soon she diversified her product offering and began selling various types of groceries as well.

Business is going well for Zocima and she has a small store in her home. But she wants to purchase a stall in the market as this will really make her sales flourish. She is requesting a loan as her income is split in two; half is for upbringing her seven children and the other half is being saved to purchase the market stall.

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.

loans.use: Purchase a stall in the market

loans.name: Villa Las Rosas 6 Group

texts.es:
Mrs.Gertrudis is 63 years old, has 3 children and has been a proud owner of a grocery store over the last three years. Her business is the only source of income for her family. Due to her age, her merchandise is transported to her home, which makes her fixed costs go up. Her margins are very low and she wants to purchase more stock to get a better price for the goods she sells, hoping to increase her profits.

Her partners sell: Flor G. M. and Maria Teresa L. L. (kitchenware), Rosalia J. H. (tostadas), Consuelo M. L., Dominga L. L., Ernestina G. H. (groceries).

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise to sell

loans.name: Cascada 7 Group

texts.es:
Rosa is 38 years old. Her business helps her support her 5 children. For the past 3 years she has raised and sold pigs from her home. People from the area and other nearby towns seek her and her pigs out in her home. With her loan she wants to buy more piglets and also improve the place where she keeps her animals. The other members of the group are Antonia G. M., Reyna G. M. and Guadalupe G. M., and they all raise pigs.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

ROSA TIENE 38 AÑOS, SU ACTIVIDAD LE AYUDA A MANTENER A SUS 5 HIJOS, ELLA EN CASA DESDE HACE 3 AÑOS SE DEDICA A LA CRIANZA Y VENTA DE PUERCOS, LA GENTE DE LA LOCALIDAD Y DE OTROS PUEBLOS CERCANOS LA BUSCAN EN SU CASA PARA LA VENTA DE SUS ANIMALISTOS COMO CARIÑOSAMENTE LE LLAMA A SUS PUERQUITOS, CON SU CREDITO QUIERE COMPRAR MAS ANIMALITOS PEQUEÑOS ASI COMO PODER COMPONER EL LUGAR DONDE MANTIENE A SUS ANIMALES, LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO, ANTONIA G. M., REYNA G. M. Y GUADALUPE G. M., SE DEDICAN LA CRIANZA DE PUERCOS.

loans.use: Purchase more animals and enlarge the area in which they are raised

loans.name: Cecilio Modesto

texts.es:
Cecilio C. comes from Villanueva in León, Nicaragua. At a very young age he decided to enter the world of farming but when he realised how low an income it offered, he decided to invest in two television sets in order to start up his own business renting videogames in his area.

It is important to point out that the area in which he lives has no electricity as it is far from any urban area, and this is why Cecilio has decided to invest in the necessities for his home and have a solar panel which he must pay for in order to rent out the videogames.

He is father to one child, who is of school age, and this is why he is so driven to provide for his family and make his business a success. The issue today is that he must urgently pay for the solar panel in order to continue his business, and this is why he has turned to Ceprodel in order to receive a loan which will allow him to pay his debt and continue with his business.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

Cecilio C. es un caballero originario del municipio Villanueva en el departamento de León de Nicaragua. Desde muy pequeño se dedicó al negocio de jornalero pero al ver que sus ingresos eran muy cortos decide invertir en dos televisores para iniciar un negocio propio como lo es el alquiler de videojuegos en su localidad.

Es de mucho interés mencionar que en el local donde el vive, no existe energía eléctrica por estar muy alejado de la zona urbana, es por este motivo que el señor Cecilio C. decide invertir en la necesidades de su hogar y adquiere un panel solar que tiene la obligación de pagarlo por haberlo obtenido al crédito.

Es padre de un hijo en edad escolar y por esta razón es que se esfuerza para suplir todas sus necesidades y salir adelante en su negocio. Su necesidad actual es la urgencia de pago del panel solar para continuar con su negocio y para esto ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos que le permitan salir de esta deuda y suplir su negocio.

loans.use: To purchase a solar panel

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es:
Mr Victoriano Méndez runs his own grocery store in Villanueva, Chinandega.

He began his business using capital funded by his own life savings. He started up his business because he saw the need to support his family and furthermore realised the need to control the expenses of his humble home.

In order to gain support to acquire products, he has turned to Ceprodel who, two years ago, provided him with a loan which he in turn invested directly into purchasing products. Nowadays his main priority is purchasing more products for his business.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

El negocio al que se dedica el señor Victoriano Méndez es la venta de productos de pulpería teniendo su propio establecimiento en el municipio Villanueva del departamento de Chinandega.

Su negocio lo inicia con un capital propio producto de sus ahorros a lo largo de su vida. Comienza el negocio porque se ve en la necesidad de mantener su núcleo familiar y además está en la obligación de velar por los gastos de su humilde hogar de habitación.

Para obtener apoyo en la adquisición de sus productos ha recurrido a Ceprodel quien desde hace 2 años ha recibido créditos habiéndolos invertido directamente en la compra de sus productos. Hoy en día su mayor necesidad es adquirir los productos para su negocio.

loans.use: To purchase products for his grocery store

loans.name: Orlando José

texts.es:
Mr Orlando R. is a humble countryman who has been working, for many years, in agriculture and cattlefarming in Villanueva, Chinandega. He is married, with one child who he supports and also who supports him in this work.

His main priority at the moment is the reconstruction of his humble home because, for many years, it has been in poor condition. But he has begun to reconstruct it in order to improve his family's quality of life. This is why he has turned to Ceprodel to obtain a loan which he can invest in the purchase of a door and roof installation. His current credit history is two loans.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

El señor Orlando R. es un humilde campesino que por muchos años se ha dedicado a la agricultura y ganadería en el municipio Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega. Es casado y con un hijo que mantener que también le apoya en este trabajo.

Su mayor necesidad actualmente es la reconstrucción de su humilde casa debido a que por muchos años ha estado en malas condiciones pero ha iniciado a reconstruirla para darle un mejor nivel de vida a su humilde familia. Es por esta razón que acude a Ceprodel con la necesidad de obtener créditos para invertirlos en la compra de una puerta e implementación del techo. Su record crediticio actualmente es de dos créditos.

loans.use: To invest in the construction of his home

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria Luisa B. lives in Villanueva in Chinandega and can be described as a strong woman who, since a young age, has been breeding livestock. It is difficult work which requires willpower and a solid understanding of animals.

Her current priority is purchasing livestock. She needs calves in order to benefit the most and then market them for their meat or milk which she kindly offers to her customers in her local area. In order to achieve her aim she has turned to Ceprodel who have offered her financial support by means of loans, which she has used to buy livestock.

Her current history is 4 loans with Ceprodel.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

Maria Luisa B. es habitante del municipio de Villanueva en Chinandega y se caracteriza por ser una dama muy esforzada que desde muy jovencita se ha dedicado a la crianza de ganado. Es un trabajo muy fuerte que requiere de voluntad y mucho conocimiento de estos animales.

Su necesidad actualmente es la compra del ganado, requiere de vaquillas para sacarle el máximo provecho y luego comercializarlas ya sea en la venta de carne o leche que con mucha amabilidad ofrece a sus clientes en su sector de habitación. Para realizar esta actividad ha acudido a Ceprodel quien le ha brindado apoyo financiero mediante créditos que los ha utilizado en la compra de ganado en su actividad.

Actualmente su record es de 4 créditos con Ceprodel.

loans.use: To purchase livestock

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Agriculture is the most popular business in the Villanueva municipality in the city of Chinandega. Wilfredo F. has been in this business since he was very young and has acquired excellent knowledge in this branch.

Because of their financial situation for being a very underprivileged town, they don’t have electric power. For that reason, Wilfredo has very wisely obtained a solar panel which he must now pay for since he purchased it using credit. For this he has turned to Ceprodel to be assisted with loans that will allow him to pay this debt, and make it possible to count with electric power so that his four small children can study in the evenings and further develop.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

La agricultura es el negocio mas popular en el municipio Villanueva en la ciudad de Chinandega. El señor Wilfredo F. se dedica a este negocio desde muy joven y ha adquirido un excelente conocimiento en este ramo.

A pesar de su situación económica por ser un pueblo muy pobre, no cuentan con energía eléctrica. Por esta razón, muy sabiamente el señor Wilfredo F. ha adquirido un panel solar que debe de pagar debido a que lo obtuvo al crédito. Para esto ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos que le permitan cancelar esta deuda y así hacer posible contar con energía eléctrica para que sus cuatro pequeños hijos puedan estudia por las noches y lograr desarrollarse.

loans.use: Pay for a solar panel so that his family can have electric power at home.

loans.name: Maria De La Concepci

texts.es:
Maria is 42 years of age, she is married and has 5 children she has to nourish and educate. She lives in the Los Ríos community, a rural zone whose lands offer favorable environmental conditions for the cultivation of pineapples, especially the “Monte Lirio” variety. She owns several blocks of land in which she has grown pineapples, and she sells her product during the months of May, June and July, when the harvest gives its best fruit. Maria’s husband helps her in the entire process from the pre-sowing stage, to the cut and transportation of the fruit for its sale.

The earnings they obtain with the sale of their agricultural products vary according to the time of year, for which reason Maria’s husband has another occupation in addition to growing pineapples. He works as a carpenter making wooden furniture. With this activity they can cover all the expenses of the harvest as well as cover their household expenses and other necessities.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Maria tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene 5 hijos a quien alimentar y educar, habita en la comunidad de Los Ríos, zona rural, tierra que presenta condiciones ambientales favorables para el cultivo de piña, especialmente de variedad “Monte Lirio”. La señora cuenta con unas manzanas de tierras en la que ha sembrado piña, su producto lo comercializa en los meses de Mayo, Junio y Julio, meses donde la cosecha da su mejor fruto, el esposo de Doña Maria le ayuda en todo el proceso de pre-siembra hasta el corte y acarreo del fruto para su debida comercialización. Las ganancias que obtienen con la venta de sus productos agrícolas varían según la época del año, es por eso que el esposo de Doña Maria realiza otra actividad aparte de cultivar piña, trabaja de carpintero (elabora muebles de madera). Es con esta actividad que pueden hacer frente a todos los gastos de la cosecha así como cubrir los gastos del hogar y demás necesidades.

loans.use: Purchase chemical fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Asunción

texts.es:
Asunción S. is a gentleman who since childhood has worked in agriculture in the municipality of Villanueva in the city of Chinandega. He works hard and ever since his only son was born has mainly worked to provide him with everything he needs.

The problem which Asunción and his wife and son face is that they live in an area of Villanueva that does not have electricity. He decided to buy a solar panel which will allow him to have energy for light at night and access to television. On acquiring the solar panel, his obligation is to pay this debt. For this reason he has approached Ceprodel to obtain a loan which will allow him to pay off his debt and continue working in agriculture.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

Asunción S. es un caballero que desde niño se ha dedicado a la agricultura en el municipio Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega. Es muy esforzado y desde que nació su único hijo se ha esforzado mayormente para brindarle todo lo que necesite.

La problemática por la que pasa el señor Asunción junto con su esposa e hijo es que por ser habitantes de un lugar de Villanueva donde no se cuenta con energía eléctrica por ser una zona urbana, él decidió comprar un panel solar que permitiera adquirir energía para alumbrarse por las noches y además el acceso a un televisor. Al adquirir el panel solar, su obligación es pagar esta deuda y es por este motivo que acude a Ceprodel para obtener los créditos que le permitan cancelar dicha deuda y continuar con su trabajo de agricultura en su localidad.

loans.use: Purchase a solar panel.

loans.name: Mauricio José

texts.es:
Mauricio, 30, is a carpenter. His wife is a homemaker and their 2 children are in secondary school. They live in the "municipio" of Ticuantepe. Mauricio has been a carpenter for more than 5 years. He has a small workshop in his house where he makes doors, tables, chairs and other wood furniture, using skills that he's honed over the years. Most of his customers are from the city but a few are from nearby towns.

Mauricio's work has allowed him to pay the family's expenses and because his job is the only source of income for the family, he works every day, starting very early. The basic material for making his products is wood but he also need varnish which he uses to give his products the finished look that they need for sale. Mauricio is applying for a loan to buy the supplies he needs to maintain his carpentry business.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

El señor Mauricio es Ebanista, tiene 30 años de edad, su esposa es ama de casa, sus 2 hijos estudian en secundaria, viven en una comarca del municipio de Ticuantepe, tiene más de 5 años de dedicarse a la carpintería, en su vivienda tiene su pequeño taller en donde trabaja elaborando puertas, mesas, sillas, muebles de madera, se ha perfeccionado en su trabajo a lo largo de los años, la mayoría de sus clientes son de la ciudad y algunos de las comunidades cercanas.

Con su trabajo es como ha podido afrontar todos los gastos familiares de su hogar, ya que su trabajo es con el único ingreso con que cuenta su familia, trabaja todo el día, desde muy temprano. El principal insumo para elaborar las diferentes piezas es la madera, así como también el barniz con el cual le da un terminado y acabado fino obteniendo de esta manera un producto final listo para comercializarlo. El señor necesita comprar materiales de trabajo para seguir elaborando sus piezas de madera.

loans.use: Buy supplies for carpentry business.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora is resident of the "municipio" of Chinandega. She's a single mother and makes a very strenuous living, raising cattle.

Dora's problem is that there's no electricity in her remote township. Consequently, she wants to install a solar panel to improve her living situation. To cover the debt, she's very wisely applying to Ceprodel for loans that will allow her to pay for the panel that will be of so much use, providing electric light so that she can work and do household chores but, above all, so that her children will have light to study.

Despite her difficult economic situation, she says that the loans from Ceprodel will improve her conditions at home and also allow her to keep driving ahead with her young son.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Dora L. es una dama habitante del municipio Villanueva en Chinandega. Es madre soltera y se dedica al fuerte trabajo de ganadería.

La problemática que atraviesa la dama Dora L. es que en su pueblo no cuentan con energía eléctrica por estar muy retirado de la ciudad. Por este motivo, solicita la implementación de un panel solar para mejorar su situación de vida. Para cubrir esta deuda, muy inteligentemente acude a Ceprodel para obtener créditos que le permitan pagar el panel que le es de mucha utilidad por el hecho de que necesitan la luz eléctrica para realizar sus trabajos, quehaceres del hogar y sobretodo para obtener iluminación para que sus hijos estudien.

A pesar de su difícil situación económica, afirma que con el apoyo que le brinde CEPRODEL mejorara las condiciones de su hogar de habitación y además logrará salir adelante junto con su pequeño hijo.

loans.use: Buy a solar panel.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Maria Teresa is 59 years old, single, lives in Ticuantepe, and owns a business in her home where she sells groceries such as rice, oil, meat, milk, soda pop. She has had the business for 5 years, earning her own income which has allowed her to support herself and also reinvest in her business. With the business she was able to educate her children, who now no longer depend on her support. Maria needs a loan in order to buy groceries to stock her convenience store and to be able to provide better service to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

Maria Teresa tiene 59 años, es soltera, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe, posee un negocio en su casa de habitación, en el cual vende productos alimenticios como arroz, aceite, carnes, leche, bebidas gaseosas, el cual tiene 5 años de existencia, obtiene ingresos propios que le permite desarrollarse y también reinvertir . Con su negocio pudo educar a sus hijos los cuales ya no dependen de ella. Doña Maria requiere del préstamo para comprar productos alimenticios para surtir su pulpería y poder brindarle mejor servicio a sus clientes.

loans.use: Buy meat, eggs, milk, bread, chicken, vegetables

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Since he was a boy, Manuel has loved animals. He has learned to raise them well so that he can market them. He's a native of the "municipio" of Villanueva in the city of Chinandega in the beautiful country of Nicaragua.

Manuel is married and has children to provide for, along with a grandson who is also in his care. To support his family, he has to invest in his livestock business and, consequently, he's approached Ceprodel to apply for a loan that will allow him to buy breeding stock and, in turn, increase his income from the milk, meat, horn, etc. that cattle provide. To date, Manuel has obtained 2 loans from Ceprodel.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Desde niño Manuel M. ha sido una persona amante de los animales, ha aprendido a criarlos muy bien para luego comercializarlos. Es originario del municipio Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega en el bello país de Nicaragua.

Es un varón casado y con hijos que mantener y además un nieto bajo su responsabilidad. Para poder mantener su familia, el único ingreso que percibe es el adquirido por medio de la ganader9ia a que se dedica es por esta razón que acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos que le permitan la compra de toros para reproducir sus crías y así obtener mejores ingresos propios por medio de la leche, carne, cuero y hasta la vaquilla por su misma. Su record es de 2 créditos con Ceprodel.

loans.use: Buy stock for animal farming business.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa is a single mother, caring for a son still in elementary school. She lives in Ticuantepe and for 10 years the business she operates has supported her. Rosa's economic situation has been difficult but her store has allowed her to get the things she needs and, with financing, she's been able to improve parts of her house as well as invest in her business. The business needs to expand and offer a wider range of merchandise to the people of the Ticuantepe neighborhood. By expanding the business and offering new products, her customer's might reach deeper into their pockets to buy the things that the customers she targets need.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Rosa Maria es madre soltera, cuida de su hijo quien se encuentra estudiando en primaria, habita en ticuantepe y hace 10 años tiene su negocio, el cual le ha permitido subsanar todos los gastos del hogar. La situación económica de doña Rosa ha sido difícil, pero su pulpería le ha permitido hacer frente a las necesidades que posee, con financiamiento ha podido mejorar ciertas partes de su vivienda así como también invertir en el negocio, el cual requiere de ampliación y de diversificación de las líneas de productos que ofrece a los pobladores de las comunidades de Ticuantepe. Esperar llegar a expandir su negocio ofreciendo una gama de productos nuevos a sus clientes que estén al alcance de sus bolsillos y satisfagan las necesidades básicas de alimentación de los clientes a quienes se dirige.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Plutarco

texts.es:
Mr. Pautarco M., since he was very young, has dedicated himself to the raising of livestock in the municipality of Villanueva in the department of Chinandega, Nicaragua. He is a single father with the necessity of supporting his three children who no longer need his help to complete their studies. His wife helps with the housework and in sending the children to school.

Mr. Plutarco is faced with the need is to purchase calves. In order to then commercialize the derivative products, the raised animals are sold to farmers who resupply the small farmers with calves. To acquire the animals, Mr. Plutarco comes to Ceprodel to obtain the necessary credit to purchase it and in this way continue to maintain his dear home.

Translated from Spanish by Andrew Tsavaris, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

El señor Pautarco M. desde muy niño se ha dedicado a la crianza de ganado en el municiapio de Villanueva del departamento de Chinandega en Nicaragua. Es padre soltero y con la necesidad de mantener a sus tres hijos que hoy mas que nunca necesitan del apoyo de su padre para realizar sus estudios. Su esposa lo apoya en los quehaceres del hogar y en enviar a los niños al colegio.

La necesidad que atraviesa el señor Plutarco es la compra de terneros para luego comercializar sus productos derivados, estos son vendidos por otros ganaderos que se dedican a suplir estos terneros a pequeños ganaderos. Para adquirir este animal, el señor Plutarco acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos que le permitan obtener el ingreso necesario para la compra y así continuar manteniendo su querido hogar.

loans.use: Purchase calves

loans.name: Ruth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ruth is a 26-year-old merchant who is running her own shop. She has two young sons, and her husband is a bus driver. Her shop has been established for 6 years. She sells rice, beans, oil, and firewood, among other products. Her clients are mostly comprised of her neighbors, friends, and acquaintances. By selling these groceries, Ruth fulfills the demands of the residents of the town of Ticuantepe. You can help Ruth in her business by providing her with a loan that will be invested toward supplying the basic grains and perishable goods at reasonable prices. As a result, this will help the customers of the store get the best offers.

Translated from Spanish by Lily Fu, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

Ruth es una joven comerciante de 26 años de edad, tiene dos hijos pequeños y su esposo trabajaba como conductor, des de hace 6 años tiene su negocio, en el cual vende arroz, frijoles, aceite, leña entre otros, sus clientes son sus vecinos, amigos y familiares. Con la venta de granos básicos y productos alimenticios, subsana cierta demanda de los pobladores del municipio de Ticuantepe, ya que el negocio requiere abastecerse de una variedad de productos, es por eso que solicita el préstamos para invertir en su negocio comprando granos básicos y productos perecederos, para así darles una mejor oferta a las personas que la visitan diariamente.

loans.use: To buy staple grains and perishable goods

loans.name: Danilo

texts.es:
Raising calves is a very common business in the municipality of Villanueva in the city of Chinandega, Nicaragua. Mr. Danilo A. has dedicated himself to this business with great effort in order to provide for his wife and two school-age children.

To support his nuclear family, he sporadically purchases calves to raise them, fatten them, and then sell them or butcher them to sell the meat. Today, his major need is acquiring a calf for his business. For this reason he looks for support on Ceprodel, by which he was financed with credit that he has used to buy these animals that make his family’s sustenance possible.

Translated from Spanish by Andrew Tsavaris, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

La crianza de terneros es un negocio muy común en el municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega en Nicaragua. A este negocio se dedica el señor Danilo A. con mucho esfuerzo para llevar el sustento a su hogar compuesto por su esposa y dos hijos en edad escolar.

Para lograr mantener su núcleo familiar, esporádicamente hace compras de terneros para criarlos, engordarlos y luego venderlos o destazarlos para la venta de la carne. Hoy en día su mayor necesidad es la adquisición de un ternero para su debida comercialización. Por tal motivo busca apoyo en Ceprodel quien le financia con créditos que los ha utilizado para la compra de estos animales que son los que hacen posible que su familia se sustente.

loans.use: Purchase calves

loans.name: Freddys Andres

texts.es:
Cattle farming is an economic activity dedicated to the raising of animals in order to generate revenue from the animals and the products they provide. In the city of Chinandega, specifically in the "municipio" of Villanueva, Fredys has earned a living from raising cattle since he was a boy.

He's married now and has two children that, according to Fredys, are his reason for living. It should be said that the low incomes available to people in this rural aren't enough to maintain a family and, for this reason, Fredys works enormously hard to provide a better standard of living for his wife and children.

Fredys urgently needs to buy animals such as cows and calves. He's applied for a loan with Ceprodel, his helping hand in the business, which has supported him with 4 loans up to now that he has used for the benefit of his business.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La ganadería es una actividad económica, dedicada a la crianza del conjunto de especies animales para sacar provecho al animal y sus productos derivados, así como la propia explotación del ganado. En la ciudad de Chinandega específicamente en el municipio de Villanueva, el señor Fredys S. se dedica a la ganadería desde su juventud.

Es casado y con dos hijos que son el motivo de su existencia según nos cuenta este señor. Cabe señalar que por vivir en una zona rural, sus bajos ingresos no le alcanza para mantener su núcleo familiar y es por esta razón que se esfuerza grandemente para brindarle un mejor nivel de vida a su esposa e hijos.

La necesidad que atraviesa Fredys es la urgencia de adquirir los animales como vaca y terneros y para esto ha acudido en Ceprodel quien es su mano amiga en este negocio ya que le ha apoyado con 4 créditos que le han beneficiado satisfactoriamente en la compra del ganado que es su necesidad una vez mas.

loans.use: Buy calves for livestock business.

loans.name: Jairo José

texts.es:
From a young age, Jairo has made a living raising cattle in the "municipio" of Villanueva in the beautiful city of Chinandega. He's an excellent manager of animals and has succeed in providing for his household with this business.

Despite his difficult economic situation, Jairo has managed through much sacrifice to drive ahead and improve his standard of living and that of his family. He now needs to buy calves and special feed for them. It's for this reason, that he's approached Ceprodel to apply for a loan that will, without doubt, provide the kind of returns he needs to develop his livestock business.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Jairo B. desde joven se dedica a la crianza de ganado en el municipio de Villanueva ubicado en la bella ciudad de Chinandega. Se ha caracterizado por ser un excelente criador de animales y ha logrado de esta manera llevar el sustento a su hogar de habitación.

A pesar de su difícil situación económica, ha logrado con mucho sacrificio salir adelante y mejorar su nivel de vida y por ende el de su familia. Su necesidad que actualmente atraviesa es la compra de terneros y alimentos especiales para estos animales, por este motivo es que acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con los créditos que sin duda alguna le impactan proporcionándole grandes beneficios que permiten el desarrollo de su negocio de ganadería.

loans.use: Raise livestock.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
Bruno makes a living raising oxen in the town of Villanueva in Nicaragua's "departamento" of Chinandega. He's the kind of man who works hard to provide for his wife and young son.

Every day, from very early in the morning, he tends his oxen, feeding them and milking the cows. Ceprodel has provided important support, providing loans that Bruno has known how to wisely use for his business. He now needs to buy two oxen that he needs to continue his business and, in turn, maintain his humble household.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Bruno M. es un caballero que se dedica a la crianza de bueyes en su municipio Villanueva ubicado en Chinandega. Se caracteriza por ser un caballero muy trabajador que ha logrado llevar el sustento a su esposa y pequeño hijo.

Siempre al comenzar el día desde muy tempranas horas de la madrugada se prepara con todos sus bueyes para alimentarlos y extraer leche de las vaquillas para su respectiva comercialización. Ceprodel le ha apoyado grandemente con la entrega de créditos que los ha sabido utilizar sabiamente en el negocio de la ganadería. Hoy en día su necesidad es la compra de dos bueyes que necesita para continuar su negocio y así seguir manteniendo su humilde hogar de habitación.

loans.use: Buy oxen for livestock business.

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
Ramon, 28, makes a living buying and selling livestock, raising cattle in the town of Villanueva in the Nicaraguan "departamento" of Chinandega. He's married with 5 young children who he must feed and educate.

Over the years, Ramon has become very knowledgeable about what is required to raise cattle, their feeding, their calving, etc. It should be noted that, in the past, this man endured hard economic times for a while, but he's managed to come through thanks to the help provided by Ceprodel. Ceprodel has granted loans that Ramon has used to buy calves, the reason, too, that he needs this loan now.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

El señor Ramon E. es un caballero que desde hace 28 años se dedica al trabajo de la ganadería criando terneros en Villanueva municipio de Chinandega en Nicaragua. Es casado y con 5 hijos entre adolescentes y niños de los cuales debe de alimentar y proporcionarles la educación requerida.

A través de los años, el señor Ramón ha venido obteniendo destrezas en lo que respecta a la crianza de estos animales así como su alimentación, tiempo de parto y nacimiento, etc. Es necesario destacar que este caballero por mucho tiempo atrás ha atravesado difíciles situaciones económicas pero ha logrado superarlas gracias al apoyo proporcionado por Ceprodel al brindarle créditos que los ha utilizado en la compra de terneros que es su necesidad nuevamente hoy en día.

loans.use: Buy a calf to develop livestock business.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Mr. Guadalupe M. C. has raised cattle and farmed for 10 years in the Villanueva area of Chinandega.

With three small children and the responsibility of providing food for his home, has has been able to improve his family’s financial situation thanks to the excellent care that he has given his animals.

Today Guadalupe finds himself in need of purchasing calves to raise in order to be able to take greatest advantage of raising and selling them when necessary. For this reason he is obtaining loans from Ceprodel in order to obtain these animals and raise them so that in time they can be used to support his family.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

El caballero Guadalupe M. C. desde hace 10 años se dedica a la crianza de ganado y a la agricultura en el municipio de Villanueva en Chinandega.

Con tres pequeños hijos y la responsabilidad de llevar el sustento a su hogar, ha logrado mejorar la situación financiera de su familia gracias al buen cuido que ha realizado a sus animales.

Una necesidad que atraviesa hoy en día el señor Guadalupe es la urgencia de la compra de terneros para sacarles el máximo provecho y así comercializarlos cuando fuera necesario. Por este motivo logra obtener créditos en Ceprodel para obtener estos animales y criarlos de manera que al tiempo sean usados para sus fines establecidos.

loans.use: Purchase calves

loans.name: Javier Natividad

texts.es:
Javier V. has been dedicated to cattle farming and agriculture for the past 15 years, and has vast experience in the field, as it is the only business he is in.
He is married and the father of two school-age children, who are his responsibility. In order to advance, he has looked for a way to improve his financial situation, and has done so thanks to loans granted by Ceprodel. These loans were invested by him in the purchase of cows to be fatten and bred, to then be butchered to sell the meat, or milked.
For as long as he has worked with Ceprodel, he has been an excellent client, who makes his loan repayments timely.

 Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

Javier V. es un caballero que desde hace 15 años se dedica a la actividad de ganadería y pecuaria, con vasta experiencia en el ramo de los animales por ser el único negocio al que se dedica.

Es padre casado y con la responsabilidad de mantener a sus dos hijos en edad escolar. Para lograr salir adelante ha buscado la manera de mejorar su situación económica y lo ha hecho mediante los créditos brindados por Ceprodel, siendo éstos invertidos en la compra de vacas para alimentarlas, reproducirlas y luego venderlas o destazarlas para comercializar la carne o leche.
Desde que ha trabajado con Ceprodel ha sido un excelente cliente, cumpliendo con el pago de los créditos de manera eficiente.

loans.use: Purchase of pregnant cows.

loans.name: Javier Natividad

texts.es:
Javier V. es un caballero muy esforzdado que desde hace 15 años se dedica a la actividad de la ganadería y pecuaria con basta experiencia en el ramo de los animales por ser su único negocio al que se dedica.

Es padre casado y con la responsabilidad de mantener a sus dos hijos en edad escolar. Para lograr salir adelante ha buscado la manera de mejorar su situación económica y lo ha hecho mediante los créditos brindados por Ceprodel siendo estos invertidos en la compra de vacas para alimentarlas, reproducirlas y luego venderlas o destazarlas para comercializar la carne o leche.

Desde que ha trabajado con Ceprodel ha sido un excelente cliente cumpliendo con el pago de los créditos de manera eficiente. Hoy en dia sua mayor necesidad es la adquisicion de los animales para su respectiva conmercializacion.

loans.use: Compra de vacas en preñez

loans.name: Octavio Magdiel

texts.es:
Since a very early age, Octavio A. has loved working with animals; he learned to breed them in order to later on sell them. Octavio comes from Villanueva, in the city of Chinandenga in beautiful Nicaragua. 

Octavio is married and has 2 sons he needs to sustain. The earnings he gets from his livestock business are the only income he has to support his family. Therefore, he now reaches out to Ceprodel to get a loan in order to buy more animals, reproduce their breeding and increase his earnings. 

It is important to mention that the loans he has received from Ceprodel have allowed him to improve his economic situation and his family’s standard of living. 

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

Desde muy jovencito el caballero Octavio A. ha sido una persona amante del trabajo con los animales, ha aprendido a criarlos muy bien para luego comercializarlos. Es originario del municipio Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega en el bello país de Nicaragua. 

Octavio es casado y con dos hijos que mantener. Para poder darle el sustento a su familia, el único ingreso que percibe es el adquirido por medio de la ganadería a que se dedica es por esta razón que acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos que le permitan la compra de de los animales para reproducir sus crías y así obtener mejores ingresos al comercializar estos animales. Es necesario destacar que desde que trabaja con Ceprodel ha logrado mejorar su condición económica y le ha brindado un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.

loans.use: To buy more animals and reproduce their breedings

loans.name: José Benito

texts.es:
Cattle are raised in order to be butchered, to obtain derived products, as well as to be used for agricultural tasks. In the city of Chinandega in the Villanueva region, Mr. José Benito I. has been dedicated to cattle farming and agriculture for 30 years. He started this business as a young man, with his father's support.

He is presently the father of 10 children of all ages. He makes a great effort in order to meet the needs of the children at his charge and to bring sustenance to his humble home. His greatest need is to buy oxen for his agricultural and livestock farming activities. For this reason, he turned to Ceprodel, in order to obtain loans that will allow him to purchase these animals and make his business advance.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

La ganadería consiste en la crianza de animales para fines de destace, comercialización y aprovechamiento de los productos derivados de ellos, así como para se utilizados en trabajos de agricultura. En la ciudad de Chinandega, en el municipio de Villanueva, el señor José Benito I. se dedica a la ganadería y agricultura desde hace 30 años atrás, comenzando este negocio con el apoyo de su padre cuando era un jovencito.

Hoy en día es padre de 10 hijos, unos mayores y otros pequeños. Se esfuerza para suplir las necesidades de los hijos a sus cargo y a la vez llevar el sustento a su humilde hogar de habitación que tanto lo necesita. Su mayor necesidad es la compra de bueyes para el trabajo de ganadería y agricultura. Por este motivo acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con los créditos que le permitan adquirir estos animales y mejorar su negocio en el campo.

loans.use: Purchase of oxen.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto E. is a very courageous man that is characterized as someone who can manage tough jobs like raising livestock and agriculture in the district of Villanueva in Chinandega. He's the father of three children and has the responsibility of supporting his family and providing them with everything that they need.

In spite of his difficult economic situation, and after much time, he has been able to get ahead in his business through the purchase of animals to breed them on his property.

His greatest goal nowawadys is to improve his economic situation and provide a better way of life for his family. It's for this reason that he comes to Ceprodel for loans for the purchase of animals so that he may breed them.

Translated from Spanish by Kim Baker, Kiva volunteer.

Alberto E. es un caballero muy esforzado que se ha caracterizado por realizar fuertes trabajos de crianza de ganado y agricultura en el municipio de Villanueva del departamento de Chinandega. Es padre de tres hijos y con la responsabilidad de mantener su familia y brindarle todo lo que necesiten.

A pesar de su difícil situación económica que por mucho tiempo ha atravesado ha logrado salir adelante en su negocio por medio de la compra de los animales para reproducirlos en su sector de habitación.

Su mayor anhelo hoy en día es mejorar su situación económica y así brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia es por este motivo que acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos utilizados en la compra de los animales y de igual manera en la crianza de estos mismos.

loans.use: Raising and Breeding of Livestock

loans.name: Maria Adelaida

texts.es:
Since Maria Adelaida was very young, she has been characterized as being an excellent worker. She began working when she was very young, in the home. Later, she met and married her husband. Upon the birth of her children, she decided to invest in a general store which she still has nowadays located in the district of Villanueva in the city of Chinandega.

She has been able to supply her business with new products, but in spite of this, Adelaida came across a difficult situation where she didn't have the money to buy her products. So, she very wisely, goes to the aid of Ceprodel for loans that allow her to purchase products to continue with her general store business, and as a result, continue contributing to the development of her children. As of now, she has had three loans with Ceprodel.

Translated from Spanish by Kim Baker, Kiva volunteer.

Maria Adelaida desde muy pequeña se ha caracterizado por ser una excelente trabajadora. Su actividad de trabajo comenzó desde muy jovencita como ama de casa. Posteriormente conoció a su esposo con quien contuvo matrimonio y al nacer sus hijos decide invertir en el negocio de pulpería que es el que tiene actualmente en el municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega.

Su negocio lo ha venido surtiendo de nuevos productos pero a pesar de esto, la señora Adelaida atraviesa una situación difícil como lo es la ausencia de dinero par adquirir sus productos. Por este motivo es que muy sabiamente acude a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con créditos que le permitan adquirir sus productos para continuar con el negocio de su pulpería y así seguir contribuyendo con la formación de sus hijos. Actualmente su record es de 3 créditos con Ceprodel.

loans.use: Purchase products for her general store.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria L. is a very dedicated and hardworking woman. She sells groceries at her home, in the city of Chinandenga. As she was going through a very difficult economic situation and could not find a job, Maria L. decided to invest her savings (370 USD) to buy groceries and sell them for a profit.

Being a very laborious person, she wakes up very early to open the doors of her business to her loyal clients. It is important to mention that Maria L. has been a constant client of Ceprodel, taking loans to buy more products in order to support her family.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

Maria L. es una dama muy esforzada y trabajadora. Se desempeña en la venta de abarrotes en la ciudad de Chinandega específicamente en su casa de habitación. Por la difícil situación económica que atravesaba debido a que no encontraba empleo en ningún lado, decidió invertir sus pocos ahorros (Siete mil córdobas) en la compra de productos de pulpería para venderlos.

Como toda mujer trabajadora, ella desde muy temprano abre las puertas de su negocio para atender a su fiel clientela. Es necesario destacar que desde hace un año ha sido un fiel cliente de Ceprodel, realizando créditos que los ha utilizado para surtir más sus productos y de esta manera poder mantener su núcleo familiar.

loans.use: To buy more supplies for her groceries store

loans.name: Emerita

texts.es:
Emerita C. breeds pigs in Villanueva, municipality of the city of Chinandenga. She is a single mother and she needs to sustain her 2 school-age children and grandson.

Breeding pigs requires much effort as she needs to take care of them and provide them concentrated food and medicines. That is why she now reaches out to Ceprodel. She already received other loans and she will now use the money to buy more pigs and food. She will breed the pigs and later on sell them in Villanueva.

She has a positive credit history of 4 loans with Ceprodel.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

La crianza de cerdo es el negocio al que se dedica la señora Emerita C. en la ciudad de Chinandega en el municipio de Villanueva. Es una madre soltera y con la necesidad de mantener a sus 2 hijos y un pequeño nieto todos en edades escolares.

La crianza de cerdos requiere de esfuerzo por lo que debe de cuidarlos y proporcionarle alimentos concentrados y a la vez los medicamentos requeridos. Para esto acude a Ceprodel quien le ha beneficiado con créditos que los ha invertido en la compra de los cerdos y además en la compra de los alimentos de estos animales para su respectiva reproducción y comercialización en la localidad de Villanueva en Chinandega.

Actualmente su record crediticio es de 4 créditos con Ceprodel.

loans.use: To buy more pigs and food for their breeding

loans.name: Maria Benita

texts.es:
Farming is an activity that requires a lot of effort and skills to work with the animals as they require care and attention to grow healthy.

Since Maria Benita started her business in the city of Chinandega, municipality of Villanueva, she has been able to sustain her two little children as she is a single mother and needs to fulfill both the roles of father and mother in her household.

Ceprodel has been a big support to Mara Benita M. as she has gotten loans to improve her economic situation and give an education to her sons. Her biggest and most urgent need now is to buy more cows for their commercialization.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

El trabajo de agropecuaria requiere de mucho esfuerzo y habilidades para trabajar con los animales ya que requieren un cuido y atención muy especial para que puedan crecer muy eficientemente para los fines propuestos.

Desde que inició este negocio en su sector de habitación en la ciudad de Chinandega en el municipio de Villanueva se ha preocupado por mantener a sus dos pequeños hijos ya que ella es madre soltera y por tal razón realiza el papel de padre y madre en el núcleo de su hogar.

CEPRODEL ha sido un gran a poyo para la señora Maria M. ya que le ha beneficiado con Créditos que le han permitido mejorar su situación financiera pero sobre todo brindarle el estudio a sus hijos. Su gran necesidad hoy en día es la urgencia de adquisición de los animales para su respectiva comercialización.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Ramón Filadelfo

texts.es:
Since 25 years Ramón M. has been a livestock farmer, he breeds calves, cows, heifers and bulls in Villanueva, municipality of Chinandega in Nicaragua.

He is married and has 5 children whom he needs to support and give a proper education to.

Ramón M. has improved his financial situation because he has been able to wisely use the loans he has received from Ceprodel to breed his animals. Nowadays, his biggest dream is to expand his business and to also offer animal derivates (as dairy products) in the surroundings of Chinandenga.

Therefore, his biggest need is to get a loan in order to buy more cows.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

Ramón M. desde hace 25 años se dedica al trabajo de la ganadería y agropecuaria criando terneros, vacas, vaquillas y toros en Villanueva municipio de Chinandega en Nicaragua. Es casado y con 5 hijos de los cuales debe de alimentar y proporcionarles la educación requerida.

Ramón M. ha logrado mejorar su situación financiera por el hecho de que ha sabido hacer uso de los créditos que Ceprodel le ha brindado para la crianza de los animales. Hoy en día su mayor sueño es expandir su negocio y ofrecer los productos derivados de los animales en las afueras de Chinandega. Su mayor necesidad hoy en día es la adquisición de dinero par la compra de vacas.

loans.use: To buy more cows in order to sell dairy products

loans.name: Musuq Sisay Group

texts.en:
The community bank Musaq Sisay was started six months ago. Now they have eighteen associates and are beginning their second loan cycle. The associates are all from the town of San Rafael in the district of Socos, which is 90 minutes outsiD. of the city of Ayacucho.

The population of San Rafael is predominantly agricultural. Many people grow vegetables or raise animals. Some are artisans who make beautiful tapestries and blankets which are used to carry both goods and small children. In the community bank they have learned to be punctual, responsible, and above all to save.

The associates have a variety of different businesses such as cheese making, raising animals, selling meat, growing vegetables, and weaving.

Each associate has a different story they can tell, such as Flor who buys milk from different farmers and then makes cheese which she sells in the city of Ayacucho. On the other hand Eugenia works with her husband to make blankets. Her husband weaves the blankets and Eugenia embroiders them.

The associates need loans of different amounts, ranging from 300 to 900 soles adding up to a total of 8200 soles (3 soles 0 $1), which they will use to buy meat, park, wool, thread, cows, milk, and to buy seeds.

One of the key aspects of the community bank is the interest earning savings account each associate has. The members of Musaq Wasi plan to use their savings to pay for their children’s education, make more capital available to their businesses, and in the case of an emergency. Their dreams are that they will continue to move forward, their businesses will grow, and their children will have a better life.

loans.use: The associates need loans of different amounts, ranging from 300 to 900 soles adding up to a total of 8200 soles (3 soles 0 $1), which they will use to buy meat, park, wool, thread, cows, milk, and to buy seeds.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María is 37 years old and married with a 10-year-old son. Her husband works in an auto mechanic workshop and she helps him with the household expenses. She does this through a small business selling cosmetics and perfumes door-to-door. Her clients are her neighbors, friends and relatives. She would like to buy cosmetics so she can offer and distribute them to the people she visits. She wants to help her young son get ahead and to be able to provide him with the education he needs to become a professional.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

Doña Maria, tiene 37 años de edad y es casada, tiene a un hijo de 10 años de edad a su cargo. Su esposo trabaja en un taller de mecánica automotriz, ella lo apoya en los gastos de la casa. Y esto lo hace mediante un pequeño negocio que realiza de forma ambulante, vende cosméticos y perfumes. Los clientes son vecinos de comunidad, amigos y familiares. La señora desea comprar cosméticos para ofertarlos y distriburilos entre las personas que visita. Desea poder sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo y poderle dar los estudios necesarios para que llegue a ser un profesional.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Cosme

texts.es:
Cosme is a producer with ample knowledge of pineapple production. For 40 years, he has dedicated himself to this activity, working all day in the field, cleaning the pineapple plants, planting new sprouts, fertilizing with seeds so that they reproduce healthily and, with insecticides, eliminating animal pests like fungi that grow with humidity. The whole pineapple harvest process requires much investment. The cost of maintaining various plots of land is high. As a result, Cosme is requesting a loan so that he may complete the production of one plot of pineapple and sell them to the surrounding communities that consume this fruit.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

"Cosme es un productor con amplios conocimientos en la producción de piña, lleva 40 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, trabaja todo el día en el campo limpiando las plantaciones de piña, sembrando nuevos retoños, abonando con semillas para que se reproduzcan sanas y eliminado con insecticidas las plagas de animales como hongos que se producen por la humedad. Todo el proceso de la cosecha de piña implica de mucha inversión, los costos de mantener varias manzanas de tierra es alto, es por eso que el señor solicita un préstamo para poder terminar de producir 1 manzana de piña que esta por dar fruto y así comercializarla a las comunidades aledañas que consumen dicho fruto. "

loans.use: Buy seeds for fruit, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
Reynaldo is a young producer of only 26 years of age. It was with the help of his father that he was able to acquire some parcels of land to plant pineapple. This would provide him a fountain of income that would permit him to become independent from his parents and become a small-business person. He has ten years experience working in the production and commercialization of pineapple of the “Monte Lirio” variety. This is a fruit that is characterized as being lush, juicy, and sweet. For a pineapple harvest to be good, one needs herbicides, weed control, complete fertilization, nitrogen fertilization, and leaf fertilization, a process which is expensive but is the most relevant process for the fruit to be well received in markets. In this form, it can generate income that provides constant money for planting and, as such, allow him to live with dignity.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

Reynaldo es un joven productor de solo 26 años de edad, fue con el apoyo de su padre que pudo adquirir unas manzanas de tierras para plantar piña, con la cual pudiera tener una fuente de ingresos que le permitiera independizarse de sus padres y realizarse como persona y microempresario. Tiene 10 años de trabajar en la producción y comercialización de piña de variedad “Monte Lirio”, fruta que presenta características particulares tales como frondosa, jugosa y dulce. Para que la cosecha de piña sea buena necesita herbicidas, control en la maleza, fertilización completa, fertilización nitrogenada y fertilización foliar, proceso que conlleva mucho gasto pero es el proceso más relevante para que el fruto pueda ser bien acogido por el mercado y de esta forma le pueda generar ingresos que le permita brindar el mantenimiento constante a los siembros y así pueda permitir vivir dignamente.

loans.use: Purchase fertilizers and herbicides for the cultivation of pineapple.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
Guillermina is 23 years old and has one child. Her husband works in a free zone in a factory. The income that her husband earns is low in comparison to their family’s expenses. In light of this, this young woman searched for an alternative form of employment through which she could generate extra income. As a result, she became affiliated with AVON through which she buys products with her own money at distributor prices and then sells them at work, friend and family gatherings. She acquires AVON products in two ways: either with cash or partly on credit or by consignment. She has to move expeditiously to pay back the company so she may achieve turnover. This young woman requires a loan so that she may purchase personal use products that her customers are requesting. It is in this way that this family has moved ahead: through the efforts of the couple and their need to search for a better life for themselves and their small child.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

Guillermina tiene 23 años, tiene un hijo, su esposo trabaja en una zona franca de operario de maquila, los ingresos que percibe su esposo son bajos en comparación con los gastos de la familia, viéndose en esa decisión la joven busca una alternativa de empleo en donde le genere ingresos extras y es por eso que se afilia a AVON, en donde por cuenta propia compra los productos a precios de distribuidor y los ofrece a centros de trabajo, amistades y familiares. Ella adquiere los productos en AVON de dos maneras ya sea al contado y una parte al crédito o por consignación. Ella tiene que moverse a colocar los productos y cuanto antes pagar a la empresa que le facilita para que vuelva a sacar nuevamente. La joven requiere de un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal que le están solicitando sus clientas. Es de esta manera como esta familia ha logrado salir adelante, con el esfuerzo de los esposos y las ganas de buscar mejor vida para ellos y su pequeño hijo.

loans.use: Purchase perfume and cosmetics.

loans.name: Pastora

texts.es:
Pastora is a small-business woman. Her experience with her business has permitted her to diversify the product lines that she offers. Five years ago, she dedicated herself to the sale of clothing and perfume on commission, food home delivery and the sale of automotive parts. She has realized all of these accomplishments with the help of her two children. She is a single mother, living with her children in the Primavera neighborhood. Starting early in the morning, she begins to prepare food for her customers. One of her children makes the daily purchases of produce and condiments that she needs to cook. Her other child stays at home attending to the sale of parts. It is a family business for which every member assumes their responsibilities. Right now, Pastora needs to buy car parts since she does not have enough, and this is the activity that permits her to pay her children’s university expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva volunteer.

Doña Pastora es una mujer micro-empresaria, la experiencia en el negocio le ha permitido diversificar las líneas de productos que ofrece, hace 5 años se dedica a vender ropa y perfumes por encargo, entrega comida a domicilio y vende repuestos automotrices, todas estas actividades la realiza con el apoyo de sus 2 hijos. Es madre soltera, habita con sus hijos en el barrio La Primavera, desde muy temprano empieza a preparar la comida para sus clientes, uno de sus hijos le realiza las compras diarias de las verduras y condimentos que necesita para elaborarla, el otro de sus hijos se queda en casa atendiendo la venta de repuestos. Es un negocio familiar en donde cada uno de los miembros asume sus responsabilidades. En estos momentos, la señora necesita comprar repuestos para carros, ya que en existencia no cuenta con suficientes y es esta actividad la que le permite pagar los gastos universitarios de sus hijos.
